NAV
Shell HTTP JavaScript Ruby Python PHP Java Go
    • Media Backbone Hive - API Gateway v2
    • JWT in request header
    • Authentication
      • Logs the user into the system
      • Re-generate the authentication token
    • Edl
      • Create an empty EDL for Web Editor, the return value is the EDL's id
      • Initiate a EDL render task
    • Ingest
      • Create a new ingestion task
      • Update a ingestion task
      • Delete ingestion task by ID
      • Get ingestion task by ID
      • List all channels
      • List all signals
      • List all ingestion tasks in a date range
    • IO
      • Initiate the multipart upload job
      • Upload file chunk
      • Query the progress of uploading job
      • Merge all of file chunks and import the file as new material
      • Import file from user's space
      • Attach file to material's file group
      • Get the writable storage space of current user
      • List all of available export sites
      • Export a specified material to the exporting site
    • Metadata
      • Get the material metadata by ID
      • Delete a material by material's Id
      • Get all of materials in a specified folder
      • Get the list of custom fields
      • Create a material only (placeholder) without physical file
      • Update material's metadata
      • Delete file group from material, the physical files exist in file group also will be deleted.
      • Lock the material to avoid being deleted or modified by others
      • Unlock the material, the lock will automatically release when 24 hours later
      • Get the media standard by ID
      • Set permission to a material
      • List folders by path
      • Get folder metadata by ID
      • Delete a folder by folder's ID, materials under the folder will also be deleted.
      • Create a folder
      • Update folder
      • Set permission to a folder
      • Create a attachment of material
      • Update attachments of specified material
      • Delete a attachment of material
      • List material's linkages
      • Get all markers of material
      • Clear all markers of the specified material
      • Get the marker's metadata by Id
      • Delete a marker from specified material
      • Create a marker for specified material
      • Update the marker's metadata
    • Miscellaneous
      • Get the version information of the API Gateway
      • Make an echo to test communication
    • Monitoring
      • Get all tasks initiated by the current user
      • Delete task by task's ID
      • Get task by ID
      • Update task's tags
      • Get all configured storage status
      • Get all services/nodes status
    • Planning
      • Create a new planning
      • Update the planning
      • Delete a planning by ID
      • Get a planning by ID
      • Query the planning list (10 items per page by default)
    • Rundown
      • Get all rundown list
      • Get all stories by rundown's id
    • Search
      • Get all defined searchable fields also including custom fields which are enable full-text search
      • Search all resource in Hive by condition
    • Subscription
      • Subscribe events
      • Test the connection between API gateway and application, connection timeout is 10s
      • Unsubscribe event
    • System
      • Get defined system permissions
      • Get user basic information by ID
      • Delete user
      • Get user basic information by login name
      • Create user
      • Modify the user's basic information
      • Get all of parameters which are profiled by user
      • Modify an user's parameter
      • Get the root group
      • Get group by code
      • Delete group
      • Get all users by specified group
      • Get all sub-groups by specified group
      • Create group
      • Modify group
      • Assign an user to group
      • Remove an user from group
      • Get all roles
      • Get all users by specified role
      • Assign an user to a role
      • Remove an user from role
    • Schemas
      • AuthenticationModel
      • ResolutionType
      • FrameRate
      • Scale
      • TrackInfo
      • EDLCreationModel
      • EDLCreationResponseModel
      • EDLRenderModel
      • EDLRenderResponseModel

      • RoleResponseModel

    Media Backbone Hive - API Gateway v2

    • Postman collection download: API Gateway.postman_collection.json

    Scroll down for code samples, example requests and responses. Select a language for code samples from the tabs above or the mobile navigation menu.

    JWT in request header

    • API Key (Bearer)
      • Parameter Name: Basic Authorization, in: header. JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"

    Authentication

    Logs the user into the system

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/authentication \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/authentication HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json


    const inputBody = '{
  "loginName": "string",
  "password": "string",
  "clientIP": "string"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/authentication',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/authentication',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/authentication', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/authentication', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/authentication");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/authentication", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/authentication

    Body parameter

    {
  "loginName": "string",
  "password": "string",
  "clientIP": "string"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body AuthenticationModel true Authentication object that needs to be authorized
    loginName body string true The login name of user
    password body string true The password for login in clear text
    clientIP body string false Client IPv4 address (optional, if your application needs to audit the login user then pass in the IP address of login user)

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success None
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    403: AuthenticationFailed Authentication failure, login name or password is incorrect None
    403: UserDisabled Login account has been disabled None
    409: DuplicatedLogin User has already logged in None

    Re-generate the authentication token

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/authentication/token \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/authentication/token HTTP/1.1


    
const headers = {
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/authentication/token',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/authentication/token',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/authentication/token', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/authentication/token', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/authentication/token");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/authentication/token", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/authentication/token

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success None
    401: Unauthorized Access is denied due to token is invalid or expired None

    Edl

    Create an empty EDL for Web Editor, the return value is the EDL's id

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/edl \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/edl HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "resolution": "HD",
  "frameRate": "STD_50_I",
  "scale": "STD_0916",
  "tracks": {
    "audioTrackNumber": 0,
    "videoTrackNumber": 0,
    "graphicTrackNumber": 0
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/edl',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/edl',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/edl', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/edl', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/edl");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/edl", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/edl

    Body parameter

    {
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "resolution": "HD",
  "frameRate": "STD_50_I",
  "scale": "STD_0916",
  "tracks": {
    "audioTrackNumber": 0,
    "videoTrackNumber": 0,
    "graphicTrackNumber": 0
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body EDLCreationModel true EDL creation object
    name body string true EDL name
    folderId body string true EDL's parent folder ID
    resolution body ResolutionType true EDL resolution
    frameRate body FrameRate true EDL frame rate
    scale body Scale true EDL scale
    tracks body TrackInfo false Tracks setting, default is 2 graphic tracks, 1 video track, and 4 audio tracks
    audioTrackNumber body integer(int32) false The number of audio tracks
    videoTrackNumber body integer(int32) false The number of video tracks
    graphicTrackNumber body integer(int32) false The number of graphic tracks

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    resolution HD
    resolution UHD
    frameRate STD_50_I
    frameRate STD_50_P
    frameRate STD_25_P
    frameRate STD_2997_P
    frameRate STD_5994_P
    frameRate STD_5994_I
    scale STD_0916
    scale STD_1609
    scale STD_0101

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string"}

    {
  "id": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success EDLCreationResponseModel
    400: InvalidFrameRate The frame rate can not be "STD_50_I" or "STD_5994_I" when resolution is "UHD" None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None

    Initiate a EDL render task

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/edl/render('{id}') \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/edl/render('{id}') HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "resolution": "HD"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/edl/render('{id}')',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/edl/render('{id}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/edl/render('{id}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/edl/render('{id}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/edl/render('{id}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/edl/render('{id}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/edl/render('{id}')

    Body parameter

    {
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "resolution": "HD"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true EDL's ID
    body body EDLRenderModel true EDL creation object
    name body string true Output material's name
    folderId body string true Specify the folder for output material
    resolution body ResolutionType true EDL resolution

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    resolution HD
    resolution UHD

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"materialId":"string"}

    {
  "materialId": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success EDLRenderResponseModel
    400: EmptyEDLRenderFailed Unable to initiate the render task for an empty EDL None
    404: EDLNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    500: InvalidDuration Invalid EDL duration None
    500: RenderFailed Failed to render the EDL None
    500: NoTracksInEDL Invalid EDL format: No tracks found None
    500: PEFFileError Cannot find the PEF file from EDL metadata None

    Ingest

    Create a new ingestion task

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/ingest/ingest \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/ingest/ingest HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "title": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "signalId": 0,
  "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  },
  "periodicParameter": {
    "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "periodic": true,
    "params": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/ingest/ingest',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/ingest/ingest',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/ingest/ingest', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/ingest/ingest', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/ingest/ingest");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/ingest/ingest", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/ingest/ingest

    Body parameter

    {
  "title": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "signalId": 0,
  "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  },
  "periodicParameter": {
    "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "periodic": true,
    "params": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body IngestCreationModel true The ingest object
    title body string true Ingest title
    folderId body string true Folder ID
    channelId body integer(int64) true Channel ID
    signalId body integer(int64) true Signal ID
    recordingType body RecordingTypes true Ingestion task's type
    startDate body string true Ingest start date
    endDate body string true Ingest end date
    ingestMetadataModel body IngestMetadataModel false Ingest tast's metadata object
    itemName body string false Item name
    comments body string false Comments
    jounalist body string false Jounalist
    category body string false Category
    program body string false Program
    rights body string false Rights
    periodicParameter body PeriodParameterModel false The parameters of periodic ingestion task
    startDate body string(date-time) false Period start date
    endDate body string(date-time) false Period end date
    periodic body boolean false Whether appending recording date to periodic task name, default is "false"
    params body [string] false Specific days in period, for example:

    Detailed descriptions

    params: Specific days in period, for example:
    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicWeekly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[0,1,2,3,4,5,6]", it means "[Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday]"
    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicMonthly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[1,2...29,30,31]", it means which day in the month

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    recordingType ScheduledRecording
    recordingType PeriodicDaily
    recordingType PeriodicWeekly
    recordingType PeriodicMonthly
    recordingType ManualStart

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":0,"title":"string","recordingType":"ScheduledRecording","folderId":"string","channelId":0,"channelName":"string","signalId":0,"signalName":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","ingestionStatus":"Ready","ingestMetadataModel":{"itemName":"string","comments":"string","jounalist":"string","category":"string","program":"string","rights":"string"},"periodicParameter":{"startDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","periodic":true,"params":["string"]}}]

    [
  {
    "id": 0,
    "title": "string",
    "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
    "folderId": "string",
    "channelId": 0,
    "channelName": "string",
    "signalId": 0,
    "signalName": "string",
    "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "ingestionStatus": "Ready",
    "ingestMetadataModel": {
      "itemName": "string",
      "comments": "string",
      "jounalist": "string",
      "category": "string",
      "program": "string",
      "rights": "string"
    },
    "periodicParameter": {
      "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "periodic": true,
      "params": [
        "string"
      ]
    }
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline
    400: ChannelIsBusy The ingestion task's period conflicts with existing tasks None
    404: ChannelNotFound Specified channel is not found None
    404: SignalNotFound Specified signal is not found None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder is not found None
    404: TemplatesNotFound There are no available templates for ingesting None
    404: NoQuotaFound No user's quota found None

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [IngestResponseModel] false none [Ingest response object]
    id integer(int64) false none Ingest ID
    title string false none Title
    recordingType RecordingTypes false none Ingestion task's type
    folderId string false none Folder ID
    channelId integer(int64) false none Channel ID
    channelName string false none Channel name
    signalId integer(int64) false none Signal ID
    signalName string false none Signal name
    startTime string(date-time) false none Ingest start time
    endTime string(date-time) false none Ingest end time
    ingestionStatus IngestionStatus false none Ingestion task's status
    ingestMetadataModel IngestMetadataModel false none Ingest tast's metadata object
    itemName string false none Item name
    comments string false none Comments
    jounalist string false none Jounalist
    category string false none Category
    program string false none Program
    rights string false none Rights
    periodicParameter PeriodParameterModel false none The parameters of periodic ingestion task
    startDate string(date-time) false none Period start date
    endDate string(date-time) false none Period end date
    periodic boolean false none Whether appending recording date to periodic task name, default is "false"
    params [string] false none Specific days in period, for example:

    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicWeekly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[0,1,2,3,4,5,6]", it means "[Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday]"

    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicMonthly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[1,2...29,30,31]", it means which day in the month

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    recordingType ScheduledRecording
    recordingType PeriodicDaily
    recordingType PeriodicWeekly
    recordingType PeriodicMonthly
    recordingType ManualStart
    ingestionStatus Ready
    ingestionStatus Manual
    ingestionStatus Filing
    ingestionStatus Completed
    ingestionStatus Paused
    ingestionStatus Failed
    ingestionStatus Canceled

    Update a ingestion task

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/ingest/ingest \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/ingest/ingest HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "id": 0,
  "title": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "signalId": 0,
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/ingest/ingest',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/ingest/ingest',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/ingest/ingest', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/ingest/ingest', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/ingest/ingest");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PUT");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/ingest/ingest", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/ingest/ingest

    Body parameter

    {
  "id": 0,
  "title": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "signalId": 0,
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body IngestModificationModel true The ingest object
    id body integer(int64) true Ingestion task ID
    title body string false Title
    folderId body string false Folder ID
    channelId body integer(int64) false Channel ID
    signalId body integer(int64) false Signal ID
    startDate body string false Ingest start date
    endDate body string false Ingest end date
    ingestMetadataModel body IngestMetadataModel false Ingest tast's metadata object
    itemName body string false Item name
    comments body string false Comments
    jounalist body string false Jounalist
    category body string false Category
    program body string false Program
    rights body string false Rights

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":0,"title":"string","recordingType":"ScheduledRecording","folderId":"string","channelId":0,"channelName":"string","signalId":0,"signalName":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","ingestionStatus":"Ready","ingestMetadataModel":{"itemName":"string","comments":"string","jounalist":"string","category":"string","program":"string","rights":"string"},"periodicParameter":{"startDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","periodic":true,"params":["string"]}}

    {
  "id": 0,
  "title": "string",
  "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "channelName": "string",
  "signalId": 0,
  "signalName": "string",
  "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "ingestionStatus": "Ready",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  },
  "periodicParameter": {
    "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "periodic": true,
    "params": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success IngestResponseModel
    404: IngestNotFound Specified ingestion task is not found None
    404: ChannelNotFound Specified channel is not found None
    404: SignalNotFound Specified signal is not found None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder is not found None

    Delete ingestion task by ID

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}') \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}') HTTP/1.1


    
const headers = {
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'

  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

  params: {
  }, headers: headers

    import requests
headers = {
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.delete('/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path integer(int64) true Ingestion task's ID

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success None
    404: IngestNotFound Specified ingestion task is not found None

    <?php

    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

// Define array of request body.

    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')");

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/ingest/ingest('{id}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    Example responses

    {"id":0,"title":"string","recordingType":"ScheduledRecording","folderId":"string","channelId":0,"channelName":"string","signalId":0,"signalName":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","ingestionStatus":"Ready","ingestMetadataModel":{"itemName":"string","comments":"string","jounalist":"string","category":"string","program":"string","rights":"string"},"periodicParameter":{"startDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","periodic":true,"params":["string"]}}

  "id": 0,
  "title": "string",
  "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "channelName": "string",
  "signalId": 0,
  "signalName": "string",
  "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",

    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",

    package main

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/ingest/channels", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    "id": 0,
    "name": "string"
  }
]

    200 Success Inline

    List all signals

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget

  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'

.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();

    console.log(body);

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/ingest/signals', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/ingest/signals");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/ingest/signals", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/ingest/signals

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":0,"name":"string"}]

    [
  {
    "id": 0,
    "name": "string"
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [SignalModel] false none [Signal object]
    id integer(int64) false none Signal's ID
    name string false none Signal's name

    List all ingestion tasks in a date range

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/ingest/ingests?startDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z&endDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/ingest/ingests?startDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z&endDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/ingest/ingests?startDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z&endDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/ingest/ingests',
  params: {
  'startDate' => 'string(date-time)',
'endDate' => 'string(date-time)'
}, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/ingest/ingests', params={
  'startDate': '2019-08-24T14:15:22Z',  'endDate': '2019-08-24T14:15:22Z'
}, headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/ingest/ingests', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/ingest/ingests?startDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z&endDate=2019-08-24T14%3A15%3A22Z");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/ingest/ingests", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/ingest/ingests

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    startDate query string(date-time) true Start date
    endDate query string(date-time) true End date

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":0,"title":"string","recordingType":"ScheduledRecording","folderId":"string","channelId":0,"channelName":"string","signalId":0,"signalName":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","ingestionStatus":"Ready","ingestMetadataModel":{"itemName":"string","comments":"string","jounalist":"string","category":"string","program":"string","rights":"string"},"periodicParameter":{"startDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","periodic":true,"params":["string"]}}]

    [
  {
    "id": 0,
    "title": "string",
    "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
    "folderId": "string",
    "channelId": 0,
    "channelName": "string",
    "signalId": 0,
    "signalName": "string",
    "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "ingestionStatus": "Ready",
    "ingestMetadataModel": {
      "itemName": "string",
      "comments": "string",
      "jounalist": "string",
      "category": "string",
      "program": "string",
      "rights": "string"
    },
    "periodicParameter": {
      "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "periodic": true,
      "params": [
        "string"
      ]
    }
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline
    400: VerifyIntervalFailed The end date cannot be smaller than the start date, and the interval must be no more than seven days None

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [IngestResponseModel] false none [Ingest response object]
    id integer(int64) false none Ingest ID
    title string false none Title
    recordingType RecordingTypes false none Ingestion task's type
    folderId string false none Folder ID
    channelId integer(int64) false none Channel ID
    channelName string false none Channel name
    signalId integer(int64) false none Signal ID
    signalName string false none Signal name
    startTime string(date-time) false none Ingest start time
    endTime string(date-time) false none Ingest end time
    ingestionStatus IngestionStatus false none Ingestion task's status
    ingestMetadataModel IngestMetadataModel false none Ingest tast's metadata object
    itemName string false none Item name
    comments string false none Comments
    jounalist string false none Jounalist
    category string false none Category
    program string false none Program
    rights string false none Rights
    periodicParameter PeriodParameterModel false none The parameters of periodic ingestion task
    startDate string(date-time) false none Period start date
    endDate string(date-time) false none Period end date
    periodic boolean false none Whether appending recording date to periodic task name, default is "false"
    params [string] false none Specific days in period, for example:

    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicWeekly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[0,1,2,3,4,5,6]", it means "[Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday]"

    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicMonthly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[1,2...29,30,31]", it means which day in the month

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    recordingType ScheduledRecording
    recordingType PeriodicDaily
    recordingType PeriodicWeekly
    recordingType PeriodicMonthly
    recordingType ManualStart
    ingestionStatus Ready
    ingestionStatus Manual
    ingestionStatus Filing
    ingestionStatus Completed
    ingestionStatus Paused
    ingestionStatus Failed
    ingestionStatus Canceled

    IO

    Initiate the multipart upload job

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/io/init-upload \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/io/init-upload HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "filename": "string",
  "size": 0
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/init-upload',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/io/init-upload',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/io/init-upload', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/io/init-upload', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/io/init-upload");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/io/init-upload", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/io/init-upload

    This is a easy way to upload large files that recommended, the RESTful API can be invoked without limitations of enviroment (e.g. cannot access the storage of MBH with NFS/CIFS), and after the file upload finished, the default importing workflow will be triggered automatically. Once the upload job is initiated, you have 24 hours to complete the upload job, otherwise the file chunks will be cleared.

    Body parameter

    {
  "filename": "string",
  "size": 0
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body InitiateUploadingModel true Initiate an uploading job
    filename body string true Physical file name on Hive storage
    size body integer(int64) true File size (Unit: bytes)

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"jobId":"string"}

    {
  "jobId": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success InitUploadResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: InsufficientStorage There is insufficient profile storage space to complete operation None
    400: InvalidCharacter File name should not contain special characters: [*], [?], [/], [\], [<], [>], [:], ["] None

    Upload file chunk

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PATCH /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex} \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PATCH /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex} HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}',
{
  method: 'PATCH',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.patch '/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.patch('/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PATCH','/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PATCH");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PATCH", "/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PATCH /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/{chunkIndex}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    jobId path string true The job ID which returned after uploading job initiated
    chunkIndex path integer(int32) true The index of file chunks, start with 0
    md5 query string false Optional, the file chunk's checksum that uses to validate chunk is completed, otherwise ignore the checking

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"jobId":"string","progress":0,"totalSize":0,"uploadedSize":0,"chunks":[0]}

    {
  "jobId": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "totalSize": 0,
  "uploadedSize": 0,
  "chunks": [
    0
  ]
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FileChunkUploadProgressResponseModel
    400: EmptyFileBinary Uploading file binary is not allowed to be empty None
    400: InvalidChunkIndex Invalid file chunk index None
    400: InvalidFileBinary Uploaded file doesn't match the checksum None
    400: InvalidJobID Invalid job ID, the job has not been initiated or it has expired None
    400: VerifyMD5Failed Requested MD5 does not match the MD5 of the uploaded file chunk None
    400: OverPresetFileSize Uploaded file chunks have exceeded the preset file size None

    Query the progress of uploading job

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/progress \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/progress HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain

  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  }, headers: headers

       )
    );

 }

 // ...

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/progress", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')/progress

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    jobId path string true The job ID which returned after uploading job initiated

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"jobId":"string","progress":0,"totalSize":0,"uploadedSize":0,"chunks":[0]}

    {
  "jobId": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "totalSize": 0,
  "uploadedSize": 0,
  "chunks": [
    0
  ]
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FileChunkUploadProgressResponseModel
    400: InvalidJobID Invalid job ID, the job has not been initiated or it has expired None

    Merge all of file chunks and import the file as new material

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

Accept: text/plain

  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'

  method: 'POST',

  headers: headers

.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();

    console.log(body);

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/io/upload('{jobId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    jobId path string true The job ID which returned when uploading task initializing

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","folderId":"string","path":"string","size":0,"itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","isArchived":true,"isArchivedTo3rd":true,"deleteProtection":true,"isCapturing":true,"materialId":"string","rights":"string","comments":"string","type":"Video","duration":0,"frameRate":0,"subtype":"string","pendingToDelete":true,"imageType":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","modifyTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","modifyUser":"string","modifyHost":"string","genealogy":{},"acl":{"type":"Public","owner":"string","permission":{"read":["string"],"readWrite":["string"]}},"virtualTrimIn":0,"metadata":{"acquisition":{"exposureMode":"string","exposureIndex":"string","focusMode":"string","focusPosition":"string","shutterSpeed":"string","masterGain":"string","iso":"string","whiteBalance":"string","masterBlack":"string","gamma":"string","irisFNumber":"string","gps":"string","rawData":"string","deviceManufacturer":"string","deviceModel":"string","deviceSerialNumber":"string"},"planning":{"name":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","director":"string","inputBy":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","others":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string"},"filling":{"inputSource":"string","channelName":"string","deviceId":"string","audioChannelQuantity":0,"sof":0,"eof":0,"totalDuration":0,"som":0,"eom":0,"materialDuration":0,"streamChannel":0,"sourceTapeBarcode":"string","sourceTapeTitle":"string","backupTapeTitle":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","filedFrom":"string","filedBy":"string"},"original":{"fieldSequence":"OriginalWay","userMediaId":"string","mainTitle":"string","comments":"string","clipTitle":"string","createdBy":"string","recordingDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","duration":0,"stc":0,"videoFormat":"string","audioFormat":"string","description":"string","umid":"string","basicUMID":"string"},"audioTrackInfo":[{"language":"string","track":0,"type":"string"}],"extraFilling":{"videoSampling":"string","aspectRatio":"string","dataRate":"string","wrapper":"string","videoCompression":"string","gop":"string","frameRate":"string","formatId":"string","audioCompression":"string","audioQuantization":"string","videoColorSpace":"string"}},"customMetadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}},"fileGroups":[{"id":"string","groupName":"string","status":"string","files":[{"fileId":"string","size":0,"duration":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","path":"string","format":{"audio":{"streams":0,"bitsPerSample":0,"channels":0,"in":0,"out":0,"sampleRate":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"video":{"bitRate":0,"bitsPerPixel":0,"frameRate":0,"height":0,"width":0,"in":0,"out":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"keyframe":{"height":0,"width":0,"position":0},"picture":{"height":0,"width":0}}}],"specification":{"tracks":[{"channelId":0,"trackId":"string","fileId":"string","in":0,"out":0,"refIn":0,"refOut":0}]}}]}

  "id": "string",

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MaterialResponseModel
    400: InvalidJobID Invalid job ID, the job has not been initiated or it has expired None
    424: MissingFileChunk The total size of all chunks mismatch, or one or more file chunk(s) missing None

    Import file from user's space

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/io/import \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/io/import HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json


    const inputBody = '{
  "path": "string",
  "materialType": "Video",
  "materialId": "string",
  "priority": 0,
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/import',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/io/import',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/io/import', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/io/import', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/io/import");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/io/import", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/io/import

    Body parameter

    {
  "path": "string",
  "materialType": "Video",
  "materialId": "string",
  "priority": 0,
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body AttachmentModel true Import request object
    path body string true Physical file path
    materialType body MaterialTypes true Supported types of material
    materialId body string true Material's ID
    priority body integer(int32) false Specify a priority for the task of import, minimum is 1 and maximum is 99, default is 70
    tags body object false Tags for importing task
    additionalProperties body string false none

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    materialType Video
    materialType Audio
    materialType Picture
    materialType Document
    materialType Sequence
    materialType Other

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success None
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: InvalidFilePath Invalid path because it's not an authorized directory that the user can access None
    400: TargetFileNotFound Target file can not be found None
    400: NoStorageUnitAvailable There are no storage units available to the current user None
    400: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    415: FileAnalysisFailed File analysis failed and it might be caused by unsupported file format None
    500: ImportFileFailed Failed to import file to material due to internal error None

    Attach file to material's file group

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PATCH /api/v2/io/attach \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PATCH /api/v2/io/attach HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "path": "string",
  "fileGroup": "Other",
  "materialId": "string"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/attach',
{
  method: 'PATCH',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.patch '/api/v2/io/attach',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.patch('/api/v2/io/attach', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PATCH','/api/v2/io/attach', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/io/attach");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PATCH");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PATCH", "/api/v2/io/attach", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PATCH /api/v2/io/attach

    Body parameter

    {
  "path": "string",
  "fileGroup": "Other",
  "materialId": "string"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body AdditionalAttachmentModel true Attach request object
    path body string true Physical file path
    fileGroup body MaterialFileGroups true Material file groups
    materialId body string true Material's ID

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    fileGroup Other

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","groupName":"string","status":"string","files":[{"fileId":"string","size":0,"duration":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","path":"string","format":{"audio":{"streams":0,"bitsPerSample":0,"channels":0,"in":0,"out":0,"sampleRate":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"video":{"bitRate":0,"bitsPerPixel":0,"frameRate":0,"height":0,"width":0,"in":0,"out":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"keyframe":{"height":0,"width":0,"position":0},"picture":{"height":0,"width":0}}}],"specification":{"tracks":[{"channelId":0,"trackId":"string","fileId":"string","in":0,"out":0,"refIn":0,"refOut":0}]}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "groupName": "string",
  "status": "string",
  "files": [
    {
      "fileId": "string",
      "size": 0,
      "duration": 0,
      "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "path": "string",
      "format": {
        "audio": {
          "streams": 0,
          "bitsPerSample": 0,
          "channels": 0,
          "in": 0,
          "out": 0,
          "sampleRate": 0,
          "mediaStandardId": 0
        },
        "video": {
          "bitRate": 0,
          "bitsPerPixel": 0,
          "frameRate": 0,
          "height": 0,
          "width": 0,
          "in": 0,
          "out": 0,
          "mediaStandardId": 0
        },
        "keyframe": {
          "height": 0,
          "width": 0,
          "position": 0
        },
        "picture": {
          "height": 0,
          "width": 0
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "specification": {
    "tracks": [
      {
        "channelId": 0,
        "trackId": "string",
        "fileId": "string",
        "in": 0,
        "out": 0,
        "refIn": 0,
        "refOut": 0
      }
    ]
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FileGroupModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: InvalidFilePath Invalid path because it's not an authorized directory that the user can access None
    400: TargetFileNotFound Target file can not be found None
    400: NoStorageUnitAvailable There are no storage units available to the current user None
    400: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    409: DuplicateReference Failed to attach file to file group because the same file has been referenced by other material None

    Get the writable storage space of current user

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/io/writable-space \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/io/writable-space HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/writable-space',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

  params: {
  }, headers: headers

  'Accept': 'text/plain',

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/io/writable-space', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/io/writable-space");

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/io/writable-space", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/io/writable-space

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"unitCode":"string","label":["string"],"files":0,"size":0,"used":0,"roots":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}

    {
  "unitCode": "string",
  "label": [
    "string"
  ],
  "files": 0,
  "size": 0,
  "used": 0,
  "roots": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success StorageUnitResponseModel
    404: NoQuotaFound No user's quota found None

    List all of available export sites

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/io/export/sites \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/io/export/sites HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/export/sites',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'

    <?php

    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/io/export/sites', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {

 }

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
