    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/io/export/sites", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/io/export/sites

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    mode query ExportSiteMode false The filter for export site mode
    type query ExportContentTypes false The filter for export site type

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    mode ExportClip
    mode ArchiveTo3rd
    type Full
    type AudioOnly
    type MetadataOnly

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":0,"name":"string","hotfolder":"string","contentType":"Full","mode":"ExportClip","policies":[{"id":"string","type":"string","name":"string"}]}]

    [
  {
    "id": 0,
    "name": "string",
    "hotfolder": "string",
    "contentType": "Full",
    "mode": "ExportClip",
    "policies": [
      {
        "id": "string",
        "type": "string",
        "name": "string"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [ExportSiteResponseModel] false none [Response object for export site]
    id integer(int32) false none Export site's ID
    name string false none Export site's name
    hotfolder string false none Export destination
    contentType ExportContentTypes false none Export content types
    mode ExportSiteMode false none Export site mode
    policies [ExportPolicyResponseModel] false none Export policies
    id string false none Policy ID
    type string false none Policy's type
    name string false none Policy's name

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    contentType Full
    contentType AudioOnly
    contentType MetadataOnly
    mode ExportClip
    mode ArchiveTo3rd

    Export a specified material to the exporting site

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}') \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}') HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "asNewName": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "priority": 0,
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/io/export/site('{siteId}')/material('{materialId}')

    Body parameter

    {
  "asNewName": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "priority": 0,
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    siteId path integer(int32) true The export site's ID
    materialId path string true The material's ID
    body body ExportingMaterialModel false Export request object
    asNewName body string false Leave this field's value as empty, otherwise specify a new file name
    comments body string false The comment of export task
    in body integer(int32) false The in point of the material to be exported (unit: frame)
    out body integer(int32) false The out point of the material to be exported (unit: frame)
    priority body integer(int32) false Specify a priority for the task of export, minimum is 1 and maximum is 99, default is 70
    tags body object false Tags for exporting task
    additionalProperties body string false none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"taskId":"string","siteId":0,"materialId":"string"}

    {
  "taskId": "string",
  "siteId": 0,
  "materialId": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success ExportTaskResponseModel
    400: ExportSiteNotFound Specified export site doesn't exist None
    400: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    400: NotSupportMaterialType The type of material does not support to be exported None
    400: NullDuration The clip file of material does not have duration None
    400: InvalidInOutPointPosition The In/Out point position must be greater than 0 and less than the total frames of the material None

    Metadata

    Get the material metadata by ID

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'

  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)

  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    pt query string false Kind of path for file, available values: Http, UNC

    Example responses

    200 Response

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MaterialResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    403: PermissionDenied Access permission denied on this material None

    Delete a material by material's Id

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.delete '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests

  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");

BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"isSuccessful":true,"rejections":[{"deleteProtected":true,"permissionDenied":true,"locked":true,"resourceType":"string","resourcePath":"string","resourceName":"string","resourceId":"string"}]}

    {
  "isSuccessful": true,
  "rejections": [
    {
      "deleteProtected": true,
      "permissionDenied": true,
      "locked": true,
      "resourceType": "string",
      "resourcePath": "string",
      "resourceName": "string",
      "resourceId": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Operation success ResouceDeletionResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    500: DeletabilityCheckFailed Failed to performs the delete check before resource deletion None

    Get all of materials in a specified folder

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/metadata/folder('{id}')/materials \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

Accept: text/plain

  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/folder('{id}')/materials", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/folder('{id}')/materials

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Folder's ID
    title query string false Exact match with material's title
    page query integer(int32) false Page index for pagination, default is "1", starts with "1"
    size query integer(int32) false Page size for pagination, default is "10", min value is "1"
    orderby query SortableFields false Sort the results by sortable field, default is CreateTime
    sort query SortBy false Sorts the result in ascending or descending order, default is ASC

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    orderby Type
    orderby CreateTime
    orderby Name
    sort DESC
    sort ASC

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"result":[{"id":"string","materialId":"string","name":"string","path":"string","size":0,"isArchived":true,"type":"Video","subtype":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","modifyTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","modifyUser":"string","thumbnail":"string","acl":{"type":"Public","owner":"string","permission":{"read":["string"],"readWrite":["string"]}}}],"page":0,"size":0,"totalCount":0,"totalPage":0,"elapsed":0}

    {
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "string",
      "materialId": "string",
      "name": "string",
      "path": "string",
      "size": 0,
      "isArchived": true,
      "type": "Video",
      "subtype": "string",
      "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "createUser": "string",
      "modifyTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "modifyUser": "string",
      "thumbnail": "string",
      "acl": {
        "type": "Public",
        "owner": "string",
        "permission": {
          "read": [
            "string"
          ],
          "readWrite": [
            "string"
          ]
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "page": 0,
  "size": 0,
  "totalCount": 0,
  "totalPage": 0,
  "elapsed": 0
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success SimpleMaterialResponseModelPaginationResponseModel
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None

    Get the list of custom fields

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/metadata/custom-fields \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/metadata/custom-fields HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/custom-fields',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/metadata/custom-fields',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/metadata/custom-fields', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/metadata/custom-fields', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/custom-fields");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/custom-fields", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/custom-fields

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"fieldName":"string","alias":"string","description":"string","dataType":"string","isRequired":true,"minLength":0,"maxLength":0,"enums":["string"],"isSupportMultipleValues":true}]

    [
  {
    "fieldName": "string",
    "alias": "string",
    "description": "string",
    "dataType": "string",
    "isRequired": true,
    "minLength": 0,
    "maxLength": 0,
    "enums": [
      "string"
    ],
    "isSupportMultipleValues": true
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [CustomFieldResponseModel] false none [Simple response object for custom field on material]
    fieldName string false none Field's unique name
    alias string false none Alias
    description string false none Field's description
    dataType string false none Field's data type
    isRequired boolean false none Identifies whether this field is required
    minLength integer(int32) false none Restriction on minimum length of value
    maxLength integer(int32) false none Restriction on maximum length of value
    enums [string] false none Enum values, available only for "enum" data type
    isSupportMultipleValues boolean false none Indicates the enum field whether support array value (multiple values) or single value, available only for "enum" data type

    Create a material only (placeholder) without physical file

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/metadata/material \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/metadata/material HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "itemName": "string",
  "journalist": "string",
  "category": "string",
  "programName": "string",
  "deleteProtection": true,
  "pendingToDelete": true,
  "materialId": "string",
  "rights": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "createUser": "string",
  "createHost": "string",
  "type": "Video",
  "metadata": {
    "acquisition": {
      "exposureMode": "string",
      "exposureIndex": "string",
      "focusMode": "string",
      "focusPosition": "string",
      "shutterSpeed": "string",
      "masterGain": "string",
      "iso": "string",
      "whiteBalance": "string",
      "masterBlack": "string",
      "gamma": "string",
      "irisFNumber": "string",
      "gps": "string",
      "rawData": "string",
      "deviceManufacturer": "string",
      "deviceModel": "string",
      "deviceSerialNumber": "string"
    },
    "planning": {
      "name": "string",
      "place": "string",
      "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "director": "string",
      "inputBy": "string",
      "photographer": "string",
      "reporter": "string",
      "others": "string",
      "equipment": "string",
      "contactInfo": "string",
      "inputSource": "string"
    },
    "filling": {
      "inputSource": "string",
      "channelName": "string",
      "deviceId": "string",
      "audioChannelQuantity": 0,
      "sof": 0,
      "eof": 0,
      "totalDuration": 0,
      "som": 0,
      "eom": 0,
      "materialDuration": 0,
      "streamChannel": 0,
      "sourceTapeBarcode": "string",
      "sourceTapeTitle": "string",
      "backupTapeTitle": "string",
      "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "filedFrom": "string",
      "filedBy": "string"
    },
    "original": {
      "fieldSequence": "OriginalWay",
      "userMediaId": "string",
      "mainTitle": "string",
      "comments": "string",
      "clipTitle": "string",
      "createdBy": "string",
      "recordingDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "duration": 0,
      "stc": 0,
      "videoFormat": "string",
      "audioFormat": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "umid": "string",
      "basicUMID": "string"
    },
    "audioTrackInfo": [
      {
        "language": "string",
        "track": 0,
        "type": "string"
      }
    ]
  },
  "customMetadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'

  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/metadata/material',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/metadata/material', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/metadata/material', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/metadata/material", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/metadata/material

    Body parameter

    {
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "itemName": "string",
  "journalist": "string",
  "category": "string",
  "programName": "string",
  "deleteProtection": true,
  "pendingToDelete": true,
  "materialId": "string",
  "rights": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "createUser": "string",
  "createHost": "string",
  "type": "Video",
  "metadata": {
    "acquisition": {
      "exposureMode": "string",
      "exposureIndex": "string",
      "focusMode": "string",
      "focusPosition": "string",
      "shutterSpeed": "string",
      "masterGain": "string",
      "iso": "string",
      "whiteBalance": "string",
      "masterBlack": "string",
      "gamma": "string",
      "irisFNumber": "string",
      "gps": "string",
      "rawData": "string",
      "deviceManufacturer": "string",
      "deviceModel": "string",
      "deviceSerialNumber": "string"
    },
    "planning": {
      "name": "string",
      "place": "string",
      "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "director": "string",
      "inputBy": "string",
      "photographer": "string",
      "reporter": "string",
      "others": "string",
      "equipment": "string",
      "contactInfo": "string",
      "inputSource": "string"
    },
    "filling": {
      "inputSource": "string",
      "channelName": "string",
      "deviceId": "string",
      "audioChannelQuantity": 0,
      "sof": 0,
      "eof": 0,
      "totalDuration": 0,
      "som": 0,
      "eom": 0,
      "materialDuration": 0,
      "streamChannel": 0,

      "sourceTapeTitle": "string",
      "backupTapeTitle": "string",
      "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "filedFrom": "string",
      "filedBy": "string"
    },
    "original": {
      "fieldSequence": "OriginalWay",
      "userMediaId": "string",
      "mainTitle": "string",
      "comments": "string",
      "clipTitle": "string",
      "createdBy": "string",
      "recordingDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "duration": 0,
      "stc": 0,
      "videoFormat": "string",
      "audioFormat": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "umid": "string",
      "basicUMID": "string"
    },
    "audioTrackInfo": [
      {
        "language": "string",
        "track": 0,
        "type": "string"
      }
    ]
  },
  "customMetadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body MaterialCreationModel true The material object
    name body string true Material's name
    folderId body string true Folder's ID
    itemName body string false The item name of material
    journalist body string false Journalist
    category body string false Category
    programName body string false Program's name
    deleteProtection body boolean false The flag is "true" if the material under deletion protecting (default: false)
    pendingToDelete body boolean false The flag is "true" if this material pending to deleted (default: false)
    materialId body string false The auto-incremented unique identifier (if leave this as blank, generate the material ID based on the configured format in MBH)
    rights body string false Description of the rights of the material which doesn't represent the permissions of the material
    comments body string false Comments of material
    createUser body string false The user code of creator, if leave this field as blank then use current API user's code
    createHost body string false The IP address of host where user to create the material
    type body MaterialTypes true Supported types of material
    metadata body GeneralMetadataCreationModel false Creation model for general metadata part of material
    acquisition body AcquisitionMetadataModel false Acquisition metadata
    exposureMode body string false Exposure mode
    exposureIndex body string false Exposure index
    focusMode body string false Focus mode
    focusPosition body string false Focus position
    shutterSpeed body string false Shutter speed
    masterGain body string false Master gain
    iso body string false ISO
    whiteBalance body string false White balance
    masterBlack body string false Master black
    gamma body string false Gamma
    irisFNumber body string false Iris F-number
    gps body string false GPS
    rawData body string false Raw data
    deviceManufacturer body string false Device manufacturer
    deviceModel body string false Device model
    deviceSerialNumber body string false Device SN
    planning body PlanningModel false Planning metadata of material
    name body string false Name
    place body string false Place
    planningDate body string(date-time) false Planning date
    director body string false Director
    inputBy body string false Input by
    photographer body string false Photographer
    reporter body string false Reporter
    others body string false Others
    equipment body string false Equipment
    contactInfo body string false Contact information
    inputSource body string false Input source
    filling body FillingModel false Filling (ingest) metadata of material
    inputSource body string false Input Source
    channelName body string false Ingest Channel Name
    deviceId body string false Ingest Device ID
    audioChannelQuantity body integer(int32) false Quantity of Audio Channels
    sof body integer(int64) false SOF(STC) (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    eof body integer(int64) false EOF (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    totalDuration body integer(int64) false Total duration (unit: Frame)
    som body integer(int64) false SOM (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    eom body integer(int64) false EOM (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    materialDuration body integer(int64) false Material duration (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    streamChannel body integer(int32) false Stream channel
    sourceTapeBarcode body string false Source tape barcode
    sourceTapeTitle body string false Source tape title
    backupTapeTitle body string false Backup tape title
    startTime body string(date-time) false Filling start datetime
    endTime body string(date-time) false Filling end datetime
    filedFrom body string false Filed from
    filedBy body string false Filed by
    original body OriginalMetadataModel false Original metadata of material
    fieldSequence body FieldSequenceTypes false Export content types
    userMediaId body string false User media ID
    mainTitle body string false Main title
    comments body string false Comments
    clipTitle body string false Clip title
    createdBy body string false Create by
    recordingDate body string(date-time) false Recording date
    duration body integer(int32) false Clip's duration (unit: frame)
    stc body integer(int32) false STC (unit: frame)
    videoFormat body string false Video format
    audioFormat body string false Audio format
    description body string false Description
    umid body string false UMID
    basicUMID body string false Basic UMID
    audioTrackInfo body [AudioTrackInfoModel] false AudioTrackInfo
    language body string false Track language
    track body integer(int32) false Track number
    type body string false Track type
    customMetadata body object false Custom metadata
    additionalProperties body object false none

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    type Video
    type Audio
    type Picture
    type Document
    type Sequence
    type Other
    fieldSequence OriginalWay
    fieldSequence OddFieldFirst
    fieldSequence EvenFieldFirst

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","folderId":"string","path":"string","size":0,"itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","isArchived":true,"isArchivedTo3rd":true,"deleteProtection":true,"isCapturing":true,"materialId":"string","rights":"string","comments":"string","type":"Video","duration":0,"frameRate":0,"subtype":"string","pendingToDelete":true,"imageType":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","modifyTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","modifyUser":"string","modifyHost":"string","genealogy":{},"acl":{"type":"Public","owner":"string","permission":{"read":["string"],"readWrite":["string"]}},"virtualTrimIn":0,"metadata":{"acquisition":{"exposureMode":"string","exposureIndex":"string","focusMode":"string","focusPosition":"string","shutterSpeed":"string","masterGain":"string","iso":"string","whiteBalance":"string","masterBlack":"string","gamma":"string","irisFNumber":"string","gps":"string","rawData":"string","deviceManufacturer":"string","deviceModel":"string","deviceSerialNumber":"string"},"planning":{"name":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","director":"string","inputBy":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","others":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string"},"filling":{"inputSource":"string","channelName":"string","deviceId":"string","audioChannelQuantity":0,"sof":0,"eof":0,"totalDuration":0,"som":0,"eom":0,"materialDuration":0,"streamChannel":0,"sourceTapeBarcode":"string","sourceTapeTitle":"string","backupTapeTitle":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","filedFrom":"string","filedBy":"string"},"original":{"fieldSequence":"OriginalWay","userMediaId":"string","mainTitle":"string","comments":"string","clipTitle":"string","createdBy":"string","recordingDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","duration":0,"stc":0,"videoFormat":"string","audioFormat":"string","description":"string","umid":"string","basicUMID":"string"},"audioTrackInfo":[{"language":"string","track":0,"type":"string"}],"extraFilling":{"videoSampling":"string","aspectRatio":"string","dataRate":"string","wrapper":"string","videoCompression":"string","gop":"string","frameRate":"string","formatId":"string","audioCompression":"string","audioQuantization":"string","videoColorSpace":"string"}},"customMetadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}},"fileGroups":[{"id":"string","groupName":"string","status":"string","files":[{"fileId":"string","size":0,"duration":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","path":"string","format":{"audio":{"streams":0,"bitsPerSample":0,"channels":0,"in":0,"out":0,"sampleRate":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"video":{"bitRate":0,"bitsPerPixel":0,"frameRate":0,"height":0,"width":0,"in":0,"out":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"keyframe":{"height":0,"width":0,"position":0},"picture":{"height":0,"width":0}}}],"specification":{"tracks":[{"channelId":0,"trackId":"string","fileId":"string","in":0,"out":0,"refIn":0,"refOut":0}]}}]}

              "height": 0,
              "width": 0,
              "position": 0

            "channelId": 0,

            "fileId": "string",
            "in": 0,
            "out": 0,
            "refIn": 0,
            "refOut": 0
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MaterialResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: UndefinedCustomField The custom field "{0}" does not defined None
    400: RequiredCustomField The custom field "{0}" is not allowed to be empty None
    400: InvalidCustomFieldDataType The data type of custome field "{0}" does not match to defined None
    400: CustomFieldMinLength The length of custom field "{0}" must be at least {1} None
    400: CustomFieldMaxLength The length of custom field "{0}" must be {1} or fewer None
    400: OutOfRangeCustomFieldEnum The custom field "{0}" has a range of values which does not include "{1}" None
    400: InvalidAudioTrackNumber Audio track number cannot be empty and must be between 1 and 16 None
    409: MaterialCreationNotAllow Not allowed to create material in the specified folder/collection pool None

    Update material's metadata

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/metadata/material \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "itemName": "string",
  "journalist": "string",
  "category": "string",
  "programName": "string",
  "deleteProtection": true,
  "pendingToDelete": true,
  "materialId": "string",
  "rights": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "modifyUser": "string",
  "modifyHost": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "acquisition": {
      "exposureMode": "string",
      "exposureIndex": "string",
      "focusMode": "string",
      "focusPosition": "string",
      "shutterSpeed": "string",
      "masterGain": "string",
      "iso": "string",
      "whiteBalance": "string",
      "masterBlack": "string",
      "gamma": "string",
      "irisFNumber": "string",
      "gps": "string",
      "rawData": "string",
      "deviceManufacturer": "string",
      "deviceModel": "string",
      "deviceSerialNumber": "string"
    },
    "planning": {
      "name": "string",
      "place": "string",
      "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "director": "string",
      "inputBy": "string",
      "photographer": "string",
      "reporter": "string",
      "others": "string",
      "equipment": "string",
      "contactInfo": "string",
      "inputSource": "string"
    },
    "filling": {
      "inputSource": "string",
      "channelName": "string",
      "deviceId": "string",
      "audioChannelQuantity": 0,
      "sof": 0,
      "eof": 0,
      "totalDuration": 0,
      "som": 0,
      "eom": 0,
      "materialDuration": 0,
      "streamChannel": 0,
      "sourceTapeBarcode": "string",
      "sourceTapeTitle": "string",
      "backupTapeTitle": "string",
      "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "filedFrom": "string",
      "filedBy": "string"
    },
    "original": {
      "fieldSequence": "OriginalWay",
      "userMediaId": "string",
      "mainTitle": "string",
      "comments": "string",
      "clipTitle": "string",
      "createdBy": "string",
      "recordingDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "duration": 0,
      "stc": 0,
      "videoFormat": "string",
      "audioFormat": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "umid": "string",
      "basicUMID": "string"
    },
    "audioTrackInfo": [
      {
        "language": "string",
        "track": 0,
        "type": "string"
      }
    ]
  },
  "customMetadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/metadata/material',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/metadata/material', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/metadata/material', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PUT");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/metadata/material", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material

    Body parameter

    {
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "itemName": "string",
  "journalist": "string",
  "category": "string",
  "programName": "string",
  "deleteProtection": true,
  "pendingToDelete": true,
  "materialId": "string",
  "rights": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "modifyUser": "string",
  "modifyHost": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "acquisition": {
      "exposureMode": "string",
      "exposureIndex": "string",
      "focusMode": "string",
      "focusPosition": "string",
      "shutterSpeed": "string",
      "masterGain": "string",
      "iso": "string",
      "whiteBalance": "string",
      "masterBlack": "string",
      "gamma": "string",
      "irisFNumber": "string",
      "gps": "string",
      "rawData": "string",
      "deviceManufacturer": "string",
      "deviceModel": "string",
      "deviceSerialNumber": "string"
    },
    "planning": {
      "name": "string",
      "place": "string",
      "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "director": "string",
      "inputBy": "string",
      "photographer": "string",
      "reporter": "string",
      "others": "string",
      "equipment": "string",
      "contactInfo": "string",
      "inputSource": "string"

    "filling": {
      "inputSource": "string",
      "channelName": "string",
      "deviceId": "string",
      "audioChannelQuantity": 0,
      "sof": 0,
      "eof": 0,
      "totalDuration": 0,
      "som": 0,
      "eom": 0,

      "backupTapeTitle": "string",

      "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",

      "filedBy": "string"
    },
    "original": {
      "fieldSequence": "OriginalWay",
      "userMediaId": "string",
      "mainTitle": "string",
      "comments": "string",
      "clipTitle": "string",
      "createdBy": "string",
      "recordingDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "duration": 0,
      "stc": 0,
      "videoFormat": "string",
      "audioFormat": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "umid": "string",
      "basicUMID": "string"
    },
    "audioTrackInfo": [
      {
        "language": "string",
        "track": 0,
        "type": "string"
      }
    ]
  },
  "customMetadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body MaterialModificationModel true The material object
    id body string true Material's ID
    name body string false Material's name
    folderId body string false Folder's ID
    itemName body string false The item name of material
    journalist body string false Journalist
    category body string false Category
    programName body string false Program's name
    deleteProtection body boolean false The flag is "true" if the material under deletion protecting (default: false)
    pendingToDelete body boolean false The flag is "true" if this material pending to deleted (default: false)
    materialId body string false The auto-incremented unique identifier (if leave this as blank, generate the material ID based on the configured format in MBH)
    rights body string false Description of the rights of the material which doesn't represent the permissions of the material
    comments body string false Comments of material
    modifyUser body string false Last modifier, if leave this field as blank then use current API user's code
    modifyHost body string false The IP address of host where user to modify the material
    metadata body GeneralMetadataCreationModel false Creation model for general metadata part of material
    acquisition body AcquisitionMetadataModel false Acquisition metadata
    exposureMode body string false Exposure mode
    exposureIndex body string false Exposure index
    focusMode body string false Focus mode
    focusPosition body string false Focus position
    shutterSpeed body string false Shutter speed
    masterGain body string false Master gain
    iso body string false ISO
    whiteBalance body string false White balance
    masterBlack body string false Master black
    gamma body string false Gamma
    irisFNumber body string false Iris F-number
    gps body string false GPS
    rawData body string false Raw data
    deviceManufacturer body string false Device manufacturer
    deviceModel body string false Device model
    deviceSerialNumber body string false Device SN
    planning body PlanningModel false Planning metadata of material
    name body string false Name
    place body string false Place
    planningDate body string(date-time) false Planning date
    director body string false Director
    inputBy body string false Input by
    photographer body string false Photographer
    reporter body string false Reporter
    others body string false Others
    equipment body string false Equipment
    contactInfo body string false Contact information
    inputSource body string false Input source
    filling body FillingModel false Filling (ingest) metadata of material
    inputSource body string false Input Source
    channelName body string false Ingest Channel Name
    deviceId body string false Ingest Device ID
    audioChannelQuantity body integer(int32) false Quantity of Audio Channels
    sof body integer(int64) false SOF(STC) (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    eof body integer(int64) false EOF (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    totalDuration body integer(int64) false Total duration (unit: Frame)
    som body integer(int64) false SOM (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    eom body integer(int64) false EOM (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    materialDuration body integer(int64) false Material duration (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    streamChannel body integer(int32) false Stream channel
    sourceTapeBarcode body string false Source tape barcode
    sourceTapeTitle body string false Source tape title
    backupTapeTitle body string false Backup tape title
    startTime body string(date-time) false Filling start datetime
    endTime body string(date-time) false Filling end datetime
    filedFrom body string false Filed from
    filedBy body string false Filed by
    original body OriginalMetadataModel false Original metadata of material
    fieldSequence body FieldSequenceTypes false Export content types
    userMediaId body string false User media ID
    mainTitle body string false Main title
    comments body string false Comments
    clipTitle body string false Clip title
    createdBy body string false Create by
    recordingDate body string(date-time) false Recording date
    duration body integer(int32) false Clip's duration (unit: frame)
    stc body integer(int32) false STC (unit: frame)
    videoFormat body string false Video format
    audioFormat body string false Audio format
    description body string false Description
    umid body string false UMID
    basicUMID body string false Basic UMID
    audioTrackInfo body [AudioTrackInfoModel] false AudioTrackInfo
    language body string false Track language
    track body integer(int32) false Track number
    type body string false Track type
    customMetadata body object false Custom metadata
    additionalProperties body object false none

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    fieldSequence OriginalWay
    fieldSequence OddFieldFirst
    fieldSequence EvenFieldFirst

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","folderId":"string","path":"string","size":0,"itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","isArchived":true,"isArchivedTo3rd":true,"deleteProtection":true,"isCapturing":true,"materialId":"string","rights":"string","comments":"string","type":"Video","duration":0,"frameRate":0,"subtype":"string","pendingToDelete":true,"imageType":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","modifyTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","modifyUser":"string","modifyHost":"string","genealogy":{},"acl":{"type":"Public","owner":"string","permission":{"read":["string"],"readWrite":["string"]}},"virtualTrimIn":0,"metadata":{"acquisition":{"exposureMode":"string","exposureIndex":"string","focusMode":"string","focusPosition":"string","shutterSpeed":"string","masterGain":"string","iso":"string","whiteBalance":"string","masterBlack":"string","gamma":"string","irisFNumber":"string","gps":"string","rawData":"string","deviceManufacturer":"string","deviceModel":"string","deviceSerialNumber":"string"},"planning":{"name":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","director":"string","inputBy":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","others":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string"},"filling":{"inputSource":"string","channelName":"string","deviceId":"string","audioChannelQuantity":0,"sof":0,"eof":0,"totalDuration":0,"som":0,"eom":0,"materialDuration":0,"streamChannel":0,"sourceTapeBarcode":"string","sourceTapeTitle":"string","backupTapeTitle":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","filedFrom":"string","filedBy":"string"},"original":{"fieldSequence":"OriginalWay","userMediaId":"string","mainTitle":"string","comments":"string","clipTitle":"string","createdBy":"string","recordingDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","duration":0,"stc":0,"videoFormat":"string","audioFormat":"string","description":"string","umid":"string","basicUMID":"string"},"audioTrackInfo":[{"language":"string","track":0,"type":"string"}],"extraFilling":{"videoSampling":"string","aspectRatio":"string","dataRate":"string","wrapper":"string","videoCompression":"string","gop":"string","frameRate":"string","formatId":"string","audioCompression":"string","audioQuantization":"string","videoColorSpace":"string"}},"customMetadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}},"fileGroups":[{"id":"string","groupName":"string","status":"string","files":[{"fileId":"string","size":0,"duration":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","path":"string","format":{"audio":{"streams":0,"bitsPerSample":0,"channels":0,"in":0,"out":0,"sampleRate":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"video":{"bitRate":0,"bitsPerPixel":0,"frameRate":0,"height":0,"width":0,"in":0,"out":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"keyframe":{"height":0,"width":0,"position":0},"picture":{"height":0,"width":0}}}],"specification":{"tracks":[{"channelId":0,"trackId":"string","fileId":"string","in":0,"out":0,"refIn":0,"refOut":0}]}}]}

            "channelId": 0,
            "trackId": "string",
            "fileId": "string",
            "in": 0,
            "out": 0,
            "refIn": 0,
            "refOut": 0
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MaterialResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: UndefinedCustomField The custom field "{0}" does not defined None
    400: RequiredCustomField The custom field "{0}" is not allowed to be empty None
    400: InvalidCustomFieldDataType The data type of custome field "{0}" does not match to defined None
    400: CustomFieldMinLength The length of custom field "{0}" must be at least {1} None
    400: CustomFieldMaxLength The length of custom field "{0}" must be {1} or fewer None
    400: OutOfRangeCustomFieldEnum The custom field "{0}" has a range of values which does not include "{1}" None
    400: InvalidAudioTrackNumber Audio track number cannot be empty and must be between 1 and 16 None
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    409: ResourceMoveFailed Specified material doesn't exist None
    409: MaterialMoveNotAllow Not allowed to move the material to specified folder/collection pool None

    Delete file group from material, the physical files exist in file group also will be deleted.

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.delete '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.delete('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/file-group('{fileGroupName}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    fileGroupName path string true File group's name

    Example responses

    200 Response

    ["string"]

    [
  "string"
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Operation success Inline
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    500: DeletabilityCheckFailed Failed to performs the delete check before resource deletion None

    Response Schema

    Lock the material to avoid being deleted or modified by others

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/lock

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    clientIp query string false Client IP address

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"materialId":"string","clientIP":"string"}

    {
  "materialId": "string",
  "clientIP": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success ResouceLockingResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None

    Unlock the material, the lock will automatically release when 24 hours later

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/unlock \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/unlock HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/unlock',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/unlock',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests

  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/unlock', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/unlock");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());

    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    Set permission to a material

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "type": "Public",
  "permission": {
    "read": [
      "string"
    ],
    "readWrite": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission");

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    response.append(inputLine);
}

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/permission

    Body parameter

    {
  "type": "Public",
  "permission": {
    "read": [
      "string"
    ],
    "readWrite": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    body body MaterialPermissionRequestModel true Permission request body
    type body PermissionTypes true Permission types
    permission body PermissionReadWriteConditionModel false Material permission request model
    read body [string] false It specifies the Group's code that allows "read-only"
    readWrite body [string] false It specifies the Group's code that allows "read and write"

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    type Public
    type Private
    type Condition

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","folderId":"string","path":"string","size":0,"itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","isArchived":true,"isArchivedTo3rd":true,"deleteProtection":true,"isCapturing":true,"materialId":"string","rights":"string","comments":"string","type":"Video","duration":0,"frameRate":0,"subtype":"string","pendingToDelete":true,"imageType":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","modifyTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","modifyUser":"string","modifyHost":"string","genealogy":{},"acl":{"type":"Public","owner":"string","permission":{"read":["string"],"readWrite":["string"]}},"virtualTrimIn":0,"metadata":{"acquisition":{"exposureMode":"string","exposureIndex":"string","focusMode":"string","focusPosition":"string","shutterSpeed":"string","masterGain":"string","iso":"string","whiteBalance":"string","masterBlack":"string","gamma":"string","irisFNumber":"string","gps":"string","rawData":"string","deviceManufacturer":"string","deviceModel":"string","deviceSerialNumber":"string"},"planning":{"name":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","director":"string","inputBy":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","others":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string"},"filling":{"inputSource":"string","channelName":"string","deviceId":"string","audioChannelQuantity":0,"sof":0,"eof":0,"totalDuration":0,"som":0,"eom":0,"materialDuration":0,"streamChannel":0,"sourceTapeBarcode":"string","sourceTapeTitle":"string","backupTapeTitle":"string","startTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","filedFrom":"string","filedBy":"string"},"original":{"fieldSequence":"OriginalWay","userMediaId":"string","mainTitle":"string","comments":"string","clipTitle":"string","createdBy":"string","recordingDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","duration":0,"stc":0,"videoFormat":"string","audioFormat":"string","description":"string","umid":"string","basicUMID":"string"},"audioTrackInfo":[{"language":"string","track":0,"type":"string"}],"extraFilling":{"videoSampling":"string","aspectRatio":"string","dataRate":"string","wrapper":"string","videoCompression":"string","gop":"string","frameRate":"string","formatId":"string","audioCompression":"string","audioQuantization":"string","videoColorSpace":"string"}},"customMetadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}},"fileGroups":[{"id":"string","groupName":"string","status":"string","files":[{"fileId":"string","size":0,"duration":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","path":"string","format":{"audio":{"streams":0,"bitsPerSample":0,"channels":0,"in":0,"out":0,"sampleRate":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"video":{"bitRate":0,"bitsPerPixel":0,"frameRate":0,"height":0,"width":0,"in":0,"out":0,"mediaStandardId":0},"keyframe":{"height":0,"width":0,"position":0},"picture":{"height":0,"width":0}}}],"specification":{"tracks":[{"channelId":0,"trackId":"string","fileId":"string","in":0,"out":0,"refIn":0,"refOut":0}]}}]}

    Responses

    List folders by path

    Code samples

  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

Accept: text/plain

  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();

    console.log(body);

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/folders", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/folders

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    path query string false Query the folders begin with root path "/"
    id query string false Query the folders buy folder Id

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":"string","parentId":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","name":"string","path":"string","usedSize":0,"type":"Normal"}]

    [
  {
    "id": "string",
    "parentId": "string",
    "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "createUser": "string",
    "name": "string",
    "path": "string",
    "usedSize": 0,
    "type": "Normal"
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline
    404: PathDoesNotExist Specified path does not exist None

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [FolderResponseModel] false none [Response object for folder]
    id string false none Folder's ID
    parentId string false none Parent folder's ID
    createTime string(date-time) false none Folder's creation time
    createUser string false none Creator
    name string false none Folder's name
    path string false none Folder's logical path
    usedSize integer(int64) false none Folder used size
    type FolderTypes false none Folder types

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    type Normal
    type CollectionPool

    Get folder metadata by ID

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    folderId path string true The folder's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","parentId":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","name":"string","path":"string","usedSize":0,"type":"Normal"}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "parentId": "string",
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "createUser": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "path": "string",
  "usedSize": 0,
  "type": "Normal"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FolderResponseModel
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None

    Delete a folder by folder's ID, materials under the folder will also be deleted.

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.delete '/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.delete('/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    folderId path string true Folder's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"isSuccessful":true,"rejections":[{"deleteProtected":true,"permissionDenied":true,"locked":true,"resourceType":"string","resourcePath":"string","resourceName":"string","resourceId":"string"}]}

    {
  "isSuccessful": true,
  "rejections": [
    {
      "deleteProtected": true,
      "permissionDenied": true,
      "locked": true,
      "resourceType": "string",
      "resourcePath": "string",
      "resourceName": "string",
      "resourceId": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success ResouceDeletionResponseModel
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    500: DeletabilityCheckFailed Failed to performs the delete check before resource deletion None

    Create a folder

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/metadata/folder \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/metadata/folder HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "parentId": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "type": "Normal"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/folder',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/metadata/folder',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/metadata/folder', headers = headers)
