    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/metadata/folder', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/folder");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/metadata/folder", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/metadata/folder

    Body parameter

    {
  "parentId": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "type": "Normal"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body FolderCreationModel true The folder object
    parentId body string true Parent folder's Id
    name body string true Folder's name
    type body FolderTypes false Folder types

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    type Normal
    type CollectionPool

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","parentId":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","name":"string","path":"string","usedSize":0,"type":"Normal"}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "parentId": "string",
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "createUser": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "path": "string",
  "usedSize": 0,
  "type": "Normal"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FolderResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: InvalidCharacter Folder name should not contain special characters: [*], [?], [/], [], [<], [>], [ ], [:], ["]
    409: DuplicateFolder Unable to create duplicate folder in the same folder None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    404: FolderCreateFailed Unable to create a folder into the collection pool None

    Update folder

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/metadata/folder \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

  "id": "string",
  "parentId": "string",
  "name": "string"
}';

  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/metadata/folder", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/metadata/folder

    Body parameter

    {
  "id": "string",
  "parentId": "string",
  "name": "string"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body FolderModificationModel true The folder object
    id body string true Folder's ID
    parentId body string false Folder's parent ID
    name body string false Folder's name

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","parentId":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","name":"string","path":"string","usedSize":0,"type":"Normal"}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "parentId": "string",
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "createUser": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "path": "string",
  "usedSize": 0,
  "type": "Normal"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FolderResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: InvalidCharacter Folder name should not contain special characters: [*], [?], [/], [], [<], [>], [ ], [:], ["]
    409: DuplicateFolder Unable to create duplicate folder in the same folder None
    400: NestedFolder Folder can't be loop nested None
    400: ExistingFolder Target parent folder has the same name folder already None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    404: FolderMoveFailed It's not allowed to move a folder to the collection pool None

    Set permission to a folder

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "type": "Public",
  "permission": {
    "read": [
      "string"
    ],
    "readWrite": [
      "string"
    ]
  },
  "applyToSubfolders": true
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/metadata/folder('{folderId}')/permission

    Body parameter

    {
  "type": "Public",
  "permission": {
    "read": [
      "string"
    ],
    "readWrite": [
      "string"
    ]
  },
  "applyToSubfolders": true
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    folderId path string true Folder's ID
    body body FolderPermissionRequestModel true Permission request body
    type body PermissionTypes true Permission types
    permission body PermissionReadWriteConditionModel false Material permission request model
    read body [string] false It specifies the Group's code that allows "read-only"
    readWrite body [string] false It specifies the Group's code that allows "read and write"
    applyToSubfolders body boolean false Apply permission changes to sub-folders, default value is "false" if leave it blank

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    type Public
    type Private
    type Condition

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","parentId":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","createUser":"string","name":"string","path":"string","usedSize":0,"type":"Normal"}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "parentId": "string",
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "createUser": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "path": "string",
  "usedSize": 0,
  "type": "Normal"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success FolderResponseModel
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None

    Create a attachment of material

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "displayName": "string",
  "attachmentId": "string"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'

  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'

  params: {
  }, headers: headers

        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage

    Body parameter

    {
  "displayName": "string",
  "attachmentId": "string"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    body body LinkageCreationModel true The linkage object
    displayName body string true Linkage's display name
    attachmentId body string true Attachment's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"displayName":"string","attachmentId":"string","attachmentName":"string","attachmentFolderPath":"string"}

    {
  "displayName": "string",
  "attachmentId": "string",
  "attachmentName": "string",
  "attachmentFolderPath": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success LinkageResponseModel
    400: InvalidAttachmentId Linkage already exists in specified material None
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    404: AttachmentNotFound Specified attachment doesn't exist None

    Update attachments of specified material

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "attachmentId": "string",
  "displayName": "string"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PUT");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage

    Body parameter

    {
  "attachmentId": "string",
  "displayName": "string"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    body body LinkageModificationModel true The linkage object
    attachmentId body string true Attachment's ID
    displayName body string true Linkage's display name

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"displayName":"string","attachmentId":"string","attachmentName":"string","attachmentFolderPath":"string"}

    {
  "displayName": "string",
  "attachmentId": "string",
  "attachmentName": "string",
  "attachmentFolderPath": "string"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success LinkageResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    404: LinkageNotFound Specified attachment doesn't exist in linkages None

    Delete a attachment of material

  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage('{attachmentId}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'

  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage('{attachmentId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage('{attachmentId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage('{attachmentId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkage('{attachmentId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    attachmentId path string true Attachment's ID

    {"displayName":"string","attachmentId":"string","attachmentName":"string","attachmentFolderPath":"string"}

    {
  "displayName": "string",
  "attachmentId": "string",
  "attachmentName": "string",
  "attachmentFolderPath": "string"
}

    Responses

    200 Success LinkageResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    404: LinkageNotFound Specified attachment doesn't exist in linkages None

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

// Define array of request body.

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkages', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkages");

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkages", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/linkages

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"displayName":"string","attachmentId":"string","attachmentName":"string","attachmentFolderPath":"string"}]

    [
  {
    "displayName": "string",
    "attachmentId": "string",
    "attachmentName": "string",
    "attachmentFolderPath": "string"
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [LinkageResponseModel] false none [Response object for linkage]
    displayName string false none Display name
    attachmentId string false none Attachment's ID
    attachmentName string false none Attachment's name
    attachmentFolderPath string false none Attachment's folder path

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/markers", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/markers

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":"string","materialId":"string","keyframe":0,"in":0,"out":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","type":"SceneMarker","color":"string","note":"string","thumbnail":"string","metadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}}}]

    [
  {
    "id": "string",
    "materialId": "string",
    "keyframe": 0,
    "in": 0,
    "out": 0,
    "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "type": "SceneMarker",
    "color": "string",
    "note": "string",
    "thumbnail": "string",
    "metadata": {
      "property1": {},
      "property2": {}
    }
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline
    400: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [MarkerResponseModel] false none [Response object for marker]
    id string false none Marker's ID
    materialId string false none Marker's material ID
    keyframe integer(int64) false none Keyframe's position (unit: frame)
    in integer(int64) false none Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)
    out integer(int64) false none Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)
    createTime string(date-time) false none Marker's creation time
    type MarkerTypes false none Supported types of Marker
    color string false none Marker color
    note string false none Note
    thumbnail string false none Image URL of marker's thumbnail
    metadata object false none Marker's metadata
    additionalProperties object false none none

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    type SceneMarker
    type EssenceMarker
    type LoggingMarker
    type ChangeMarker
    type Contribution

    Clear all markers of the specified material

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget

  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

       )
    );

    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker('{markerId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's Id
    markerId path string true Marker's Id

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","materialId":"string","keyframe":0,"in":0,"out":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","type":"SceneMarker","color":"string","note":"string","thumbnail":"string","metadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "materialId": "string",
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "type": "SceneMarker",
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "thumbnail": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MarkerResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    404: MarkerNotFound Specified marker doesn't exist None

    Delete a marker from specified material

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker('{markerId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker('{markerId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker('{markerId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker('{markerId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's Id
    markerId path string true Marker's Id

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","materialId":"string","keyframe":0,"in":0,"out":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","type":"SceneMarker","color":"string","note":"string","thumbnail":"string","metadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "materialId": "string",
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "type": "SceneMarker",
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "thumbnail": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MarkerResponseModel
    404: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    404: MarkerNotFound Specified marker doesn't exist None

    Create a marker for specified material

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "type": "SceneMarker",
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("POST");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker

    Body parameter

    {
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "type": "SceneMarker",
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    body body MarkerCreationModel true The marker object
    keyframe body integer(int64) true Keyframe's position (unit: frame)
    in body integer(int64) false Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)
    out body integer(int64) false Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)
    type body MarkerTypes true Supported types of Marker
    color body string false Marker color
    note body string false Note
    metadata body object false Marker's metadata
    additionalProperties body object false none

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    type SceneMarker
    type EssenceMarker
    type LoggingMarker
    type ChangeMarker
    type Contribution

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","materialId":"string","keyframe":0,"in":0,"out":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","type":"SceneMarker","color":"string","note":"string","thumbnail":"string","metadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "materialId": "string",
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "type": "SceneMarker",
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "thumbnail": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MarkerResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    400: MarkerNotFound Specified marker doesn't exist None
    409: DuplicatedMarker The same type of markers are not allowed to repeat in the same position None
    400: MissingPoint In point and Out point must be specified at the same time None
    400: InvalidKeyframePosition The Keyframe position must be greater than 0 and less than the total frames of the material None
    400: InvalidInPoint The In point position must be greater than or equal to 0 None
    400: InvalidOutPoint The Out point position must be less than the total frames of the material: {0} None

    Update the marker's metadata

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "id": "string",
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  }, headers: headers

    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

// Define array of request body.

    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    response.append(inputLine);

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/metadata/material('{materialId}')/marker

    Body parameter

    {
  "id": "string",
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    materialId path string true Material's ID
    body body MarkerModificationModel true The marker object
    id body string true Marker's ID
    keyframe body integer(int64) false Keyframe's position (unit: frame)
    in body integer(int64) false Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)
    out body integer(int64) false Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)
    color body string false Marker color
    note body string false Note
    metadata body object false Marker's metadata
    additionalProperties body object false none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","materialId":"string","keyframe":0,"in":0,"out":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","type":"SceneMarker","color":"string","note":"string","thumbnail":"string","metadata":{"property1":{},"property2":{}}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "materialId": "string",
  "keyframe": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "type": "SceneMarker",
  "color": "string",
  "note": "string",
  "thumbnail": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success MarkerResponseModel
    400: ValidationFailed Invalid request body None
    400: MaterialNotFound Specified material doesn't exist None
    400: MarkerNotFound Specified marker doesn't exist None
    409: DuplicatedMarker The same type of markers are not allowed to repeat in the same position None
    400: InvalidInPoint The In point position must be greater than or equal to 0 None
    400: InvalidOutPoint The Out point position must be less than the total frames of the material: {0} None
    400: MissingPoint In point and Out point must be specified at the same time None
    400: InvalidKeyframePosition The Keyframe position must be greater than 0 and less than the total frames of the material None
    400: InvalidInOutPointPosition The In/Out point position must be greater than 0 and less than the total frames of the material None

    Miscellaneous

    Get the version information of the API Gateway

  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /misc/version HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/misc/version',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'

  params: {
  }, headers: headers

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/misc/version', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/misc/version");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},

    }

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/misc/version", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    Monitoring

    Get all tasks initiated by the current user

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/monitoring/tasks \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/monitoring/tasks HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/monitoring/tasks',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.get '/api/v2/monitoring/tasks',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.get('/api/v2/monitoring/tasks', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/monitoring/tasks', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/monitoring/tasks");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("GET");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/monitoring/tasks", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/monitoring/tasks

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    taskName query string false Search tasks by name
    createTime query string(date-time) false Search tasks which are later than "CreateTime" and within 180 days
    endTime query string(date-time) false Search tasks which are earlier than "EndTime"
    tags query string false Search tasks by tags, this parameter is Key-Value pairs for querying, for example: tags={"Tag1":"Value1","Tag2":"Value2"}, but it as QueryString should be encoded to "tags=%7B%22Tag1%22:%22Value1%22,%22Tag2%22:%22Value2%22%7D"
    status query TaskExecutionStatus false Search tasks by specified status
    page query integer(int32) false Page index for pagination, default is "1", starts with "1"
    size query integer(int32) false Page size for pagination, default is "10", min value is "1"
    orderby query TaskSortableFields false Sort results by sortable field, default is "CreateTime"
    sort query SortBy false Sorts the result in ascending or descending order, default is "ASC"

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    status Success
    status Failed
    status Executing
    status Unknow
    orderby Name
    orderby CreateTime
    orderby EndTime
    orderby TaskType
    orderby Status
    orderby Progress
    sort DESC
    sort ASC

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"tasks":[{"id":"string","name":"string","type":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","creatorId":"string","creator":"string","progress":0,"status":"Success","step":"string","stepCursor":"string","tags":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}],"page":0,"size":0,"total":0}

    {
  "tasks": [
    {
      "id": "string",
      "name": "string",
      "type": 0,
      "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "creatorId": "string",
      "creator": "string",
      "progress": 0,
      "status": "Success",
      "step": "string",
      "stepCursor": "string",
      "tags": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "page": 0,
  "size": 0,
  "total": 0
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success TaskResultResponseModel

    Delete task by task's ID

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.delete '/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.delete('/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    taskId path string true Task's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","type":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","creatorId":"string","creator":"string","progress":0,"status":"Success","step":"string","stepCursor":"string","tags":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "type": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "creatorId": "string",
  "creator": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "status": "Success",
  "step": "string",
  "stepCursor": "string",
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success TaskResponseModel
    404: TaskNotFound Specified task doesn't exist None
    400: DeleteTaskFailed Executing task can't be deleted None

    Get task by ID

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',

        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );

 }

    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    taskId path string true Task's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","type":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","creatorId":"string","creator":"string","progress":0,"status":"Success","step":"string","stepCursor":"string","tags":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "type": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "creatorId": "string",
  "creator": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "status": "Success",
  "step": "string",
  "stepCursor": "string",
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",

  }

    Update task's tags

  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}') HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "property1": "string",
  "property2": "string"
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PUT");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/monitoring/task('{taskId}')

    Body parameter

    {
  "property1": "string",
  "property2": "string"
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    taskId path string true Thet task's ID
    body body object true Key-Value pair as tags for task
    additionalProperties body string false none

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","name":"string","type":0,"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","endTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","creatorId":"string","creator":"string","progress":0,"status":"Success","step":"string","stepCursor":"string","tags":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "type": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "creatorId": "string",
  "creator": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "status": "Success",
  "step": "string",
  "stepCursor": "string",
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success TaskResponseModel
    404: TaskNotFound Specified task doesn't exist None

    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/monitoring/statistics/storage', array(
        'headers' => $headers,

       )
    );

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/monitoring/statistics/storage", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/monitoring/statistics/storage

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"storageCode":"string","size":0,"assigned":0,"used":0,"files":0}]

    [
  {
    "storageCode": "string",
    "size": 0,
    "assigned": 0,
    "used": 0,
    "files": 0
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [StorageConfigurationResponseModel] false none [Response object for storage configuration]
    storageCode string false none Auto-generated code for storage configuration
    size integer(int64) false none Total size, if the values is "-1" which means the logic storage size without limitation (unit: bytes)
    assigned integer(int64) false none Assigned storage size (unit: bytes)
    used integer(int64) false none Used storage size (unit: bytes)
    files integer(int64) false none Total number of files

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/monitoring/statistics/services", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/monitoring/statistics/services

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"name":"string","nodes":[{"hostname":"string","status":"Up","uptime":0,"downtime":0}],"status":"Up","uptime":0,"downtime":0}]

    [
  {
    "name": "string",
    "nodes": [
      {
        "hostname": "string",
        "status": "Up",
        "uptime": 0,
        "downtime": 0
      }
    ],
    "status": "Up",
    "uptime": 0,
    "downtime": 0
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [ServiceStatusResponseModel] false none [The response model of service status]
    name string false none Service name
    nodes [ServiceStatusOnNodeResponseModel] false none The node(s) where the service is deployed
    hostname string false none Hostname
    status ServiceStatus false none The running status of foundation service
    uptime integer(int32) false none Uptime (unit: second)
    downtime integer(int32) false none Downtime (unit: second)
    status ServiceStatus false none The running status of foundation service
    uptime integer(int32) false none Uptime (unit: second)
    downtime integer(int32) false none Downtime (unit: second)

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    status Up
    status Down
    status Up
    status Down

    Planning

    Create a new planning

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X POST /api/v2/planning/planning \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    POST /api/v2/planning/planning HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "inputBy": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "sourceType": "SDI",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/planning/planning',
{
  method: 'POST',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.post '/api/v2/planning/planning',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests

  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.post('/api/v2/planning/planning', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

// Define array of request body.

    $response = $client->request('POST','/api/v2/planning/planning', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...

    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));

    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v2/planning/planning", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    POST /api/v2/planning/planning

    Body parameter

    {
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "inputBy": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "sourceType": "SDI",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body PlanningCreationModel true The planning object
    name body string true Planning's name
    folderId body string true Folder ID
    inputBy body string false Input by
    place body string false Place
    planningDate body string(date-time) false Planning date
    startDate body string(date-time) false The start date of planning
    endDate body string(date-time) false The end date of planning
    director body string false Director
    photographer body string false Photographer
    reporter body string false Reporter
    otherEngineer body string false Other engineer
    equipment body string false Equipment
    contactInfo body string false Contact information
    inputSource body string false Input source
    sourceType body PlanningSourceType false Options for planning's resource types
    metadata body PlanningMaterialMetadataModel false Planning's material metadata
    rights body string false Rights
    comments body string false Comments
    itemName body string false Item name
    journalist body string false Journalist
    category body string false Category
    programName body string false Program name
    tapeBarcode body string false Tape barcode
    tapeTitle body string false Tape title

    Enumerated Values

    Parameter Value
    sourceType SDI
    sourceType FILE
    sourceType LIVE
    sourceType VTR

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","folderId":"string","planningName":"string","inputBy":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"string","startDate":"string","endDate":"string","createDate":"string","modifyDate":"string","director":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","otherEngineer":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string","sourceType":"SDI","metadata":{"rights":"string","comments":"string","itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","tapeBarcode":"string","tapeTitle":"string"}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "planningName": "string",
  "inputBy": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "string",
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "createDate": "string",
  "modifyDate": "string",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "sourceType": "SDI",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success PlanningResponseModel
    400: InvalidEndDate The end date cannot be smaller than the start date, and the interval between them must be no more than one day None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None

    Update the planning

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/planning/planning \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json-patch+json' \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/planning/planning HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json-patch+json
Accept: text/plain


    const inputBody = '{
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "inputBy": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}';
const headers = {
  'Content-Type':'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/planning/planning',
{
  method: 'PUT',
  body: inputBody,
  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/planning/planning',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json-patch+json',
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/planning/planning', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Content-Type' => 'application/json-patch+json',
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/planning/planning', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/planning/planning");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PUT");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Content-Type": []string{"application/json-patch+json"},
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/planning/planning", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/planning/planning

    Body parameter

    {
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "inputBy": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    body body PlanningModificationModel true The planning object
    id body string true Planning's ID
    name body string false Planning's name
    inputBy body string false Input by
    folderId body string false Folder ID
    place body string false Place
    planningDate body string(date-time) false Planning date
    startDate body string(date-time) false The start time of planning
    endDate body string(date-time) false The end time of planning
    director body string false Director
    photographer body string false Photographer
    reporter body string false Reporter
    otherEngineer body string false Other engineer
    equipment body string false Equipment
    contactInfo body string false Contact information
    inputSource body string false Input source
    metadata body PlanningMaterialMetadataModel false Planning's material metadata
    rights body string false Rights
    comments body string false Comments
    itemName body string false Item name
    journalist body string false Journalist
    category body string false Category
    programName body string false Program name
    tapeBarcode body string false Tape barcode
    tapeTitle body string false Tape title

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","folderId":"string","planningName":"string","inputBy":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"string","startDate":"string","endDate":"string","createDate":"string","modifyDate":"string","director":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","otherEngineer":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string","sourceType":"SDI","metadata":{"rights":"string","comments":"string","itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","tapeBarcode":"string","tapeTitle":"string"}}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "planningName": "string",
  "inputBy": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "string",
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "createDate": "string",
  "modifyDate": "string",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "sourceType": "SDI",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success PlanningResponseModel
    400: InvalidEndDate The end date cannot be smaller than the start date, and the interval between them must be no more than one day None
    404: FolderNotFound Specified folder doesn't exist None
    404: PlanningNotFound Specified planning doesn't exist None

    Delete a planning by ID

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/planning/planning('{id}') \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/planning/planning('{id}') HTTP/1.1


    
const headers = {
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.delete '/api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.delete('/api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/planning/planning('{id}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    id path string true Planning's ID

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success None
    404: PlanningNotFound Specified planning doesn't exist None

    Query the planning list (10 items per page by default)

    Code samples

  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'

  'Accept':'text/plain',

  method: 'GET',

.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();

    package main

    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/planning/plannings

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    page query integer(int32) false Page index for pagination, default is "0", starts with "0"

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"result":[{"id":"string","folderId":"string","planningName":"string","inputBy":"string","place":"string","planningDate":"string","startDate":"string","endDate":"string","createDate":"string","modifyDate":"string","director":"string","photographer":"string","reporter":"string","otherEngineer":"string","equipment":"string","contactInfo":"string","inputSource":"string","sourceType":"SDI","metadata":{"rights":"string","comments":"string","itemName":"string","journalist":"string","category":"string","programName":"string","tapeBarcode":"string","tapeTitle":"string"}}],"page":0,"size":0,"totalCount":0,"totalPage":0,"elapsed":0}

    {
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "string",
      "folderId": "string",
      "planningName": "string",
      "inputBy": "string",
      "place": "string",
      "planningDate": "string",
      "startDate": "string",
      "endDate": "string",
      "createDate": "string",
      "modifyDate": "string",
      "director": "string",
      "photographer": "string",
      "reporter": "string",
      "otherEngineer": "string",
      "equipment": "string",
      "contactInfo": "string",
      "inputSource": "string",
      "sourceType": "SDI",
      "metadata": {
        "rights": "string",
        "comments": "string",
        "itemName": "string",
        "journalist": "string",
        "category": "string",
        "programName": "string",
        "tapeBarcode": "string",
        "tapeTitle": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "page": 0,
  "size": 0,
  "totalCount": 0,
  "totalPage": 0,
  "elapsed": 0
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success PlanningResponseModelPaginationResponseModel

    Rundown

    Get all rundown list

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X GET /api/v2/rundowns \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    GET /api/v2/rundowns HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/rundowns',
{
  method: 'GET',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

  params: {
  }, headers: headers

  'Accept': 'text/plain',

    <?php

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

// Define array of request body.

try {
    $response = $client->request('GET','/api/v2/rundowns', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
