    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v2/system/role('{code}')/users", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    GET /api/v2/system/role('{code}')/users

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    code path string true Group's code

    Example responses

    200 Response

    [{"id":"string","avatarUrl":"string","email":"string","loginName":"string","showName":"string","phoneNumber":"string","createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","status":"Active"}]

    [
  {
    "id": "string",
    "avatarUrl": "string",
    "email": "string",
    "loginName": "string",
    "showName": "string",
    "phoneNumber": "string",
    "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "status": "Active"
  }
]

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success Inline
    404: RoleNotFound Specified role doesn't exist None

    Response Schema

    Status Code 200

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous [UserSimpleResponseModel] false none [Response simple object for user]
    id string false none User's ID
    avatarUrl string false none An URL of the user's avatar
    email string false none Email
    loginName string false none User's login ID, it's unique and case-insensitive
    showName string false none User's name for display
    phoneNumber string false none User's contact number
    createTime string(date-time) false none User creation time
    status UserStatus false none User's status

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    status Active
    status Disabled

    Assign an user to a role

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X PUT /api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}') \
  -H 'Accept: text/plain' \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    PUT /api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}') HTTP/1.1

Accept: text/plain


    
const headers = {
  'Accept':'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')',
{
  method: 'PUT',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Accept' => 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.put '/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Accept': 'text/plain',
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.put('/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Accept' => 'text/plain',
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('PUT','/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("PUT");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Accept": []string{"text/plain"},
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("PUT", "/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    PUT /api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    roleId path string true Role's ID
    userId path string true User's ID

    Example responses

    200 Response

    {"id":"string","avatarUrl":"string","email":"string","loginName":"string","showName":"string","phoneNumber":"string","groups":[{"code":"string","name":"string"}],"roles":[{"code":"string","name":"string","fromGroup":{"groupCode":"string","groupName":"string"}}],"permissions":["string"],"storages":[{"poolCode":"string","description":"string","dependsOnGroup":{},"dependsOnRole":{},"units":[{"unitCode":"string","label":["string"],"files":0,"size":0,"used":0,"roots":{"property1":"string","property2":"string"}}]}],"createTime":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","status":"Active"}

    {
  "id": "string",
  "avatarUrl": "string",
  "email": "string",
  "loginName": "string",
  "showName": "string",
  "phoneNumber": "string",
  "groups": [
    {
      "code": "string",
      "name": "string"
    }
  ],
  "roles": [
    {
      "code": "string",
      "name": "string",
      "fromGroup": {
        "groupCode": "string",
        "groupName": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "permissions": [
    "string"
  ],
  "storages": [
    {
      "poolCode": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "dependsOnGroup": {},
      "dependsOnRole": {},
      "units": [
        {
          "unitCode": "string",
          "label": [
            "string"
          ],
          "files": 0,
          "size": 0,
          "used": 0,
          "roots": {
            "property1": "string",
            "property2": "string"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "status": "Active"
}

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success UserResponseModel
    404: RoleNotFound Specified role doesn't exist None
    404: UserNotFound Specified role doesn't exist None

    Remove an user from role

    Code samples

    # You can also use wget
curl -X DELETE /api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}') \
  -H 'Basic Authorization: API_KEY'


    DELETE /api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}') HTTP/1.1


    
const headers = {
  'Basic Authorization':'API_KEY'
};

fetch('/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')',
{
  method: 'DELETE',

  headers: headers
})
.then(function(res) {
    return res.json();
}).then(function(body) {
    console.log(body);
});


    require 'rest-client'
require 'json'

headers = {
  'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY'
}

result = RestClient.delete '/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')',
  params: {
  }, headers: headers

p JSON.parse(result)


    import requests
headers = {
  'Basic Authorization': 'API_KEY'
}

r = requests.delete('/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')', headers = headers)

print(r.json())


    <?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$headers = array(
    'Basic Authorization' => 'API_KEY',
);

$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();

// Define array of request body.
$request_body = array();

try {
    $response = $client->request('DELETE','/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')', array(
        'headers' => $headers,
        'json' => $request_body,
       )
    );
    print_r($response->getBody()->getContents());
 }
 catch (\GuzzleHttp\Exception\BadResponseException $e) {
    // handle exception or api errors.
    print_r($e->getMessage());
 }

 // ...


    URL obj = new URL("/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')");
HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) obj.openConnection();
con.setRequestMethod("DELETE");
int responseCode = con.getResponseCode();
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
    new InputStreamReader(con.getInputStream()));
String inputLine;
StringBuffer response = new StringBuffer();
while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
    response.append(inputLine);
}
in.close();
System.out.println(response.toString());


    package main

import (
       "bytes"
       "net/http"
)

func main() {

    headers := map[string][]string{
        "Basic Authorization": []string{"API_KEY"},
    }

    data := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte{jsonReq})
    req, err := http.NewRequest("DELETE", "/api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')", data)
    req.Header = headers

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    // ...
}

    DELETE /api/v2/system/role('{roleId}')/user('{userId}')

    Parameters

    Name In Type Required Description
    roleId path string true Role's ID
    userId path string true User's ID

    Responses

    Status Description Schema
    200 Success None
    404: RoleNotFound Specified role doesn't exist None
    404: UserNotFound Specified role doesn't exist None

    Schemas

    AuthenticationModel

    {
  "loginName": "string",
  "password": "string",
  "clientIP": "string"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    loginName string true none The login name of user
    password string true none The password for login in clear text
    clientIP string false none Client IPv4 address (optional, if your application needs to audit the login user then pass in the IP address of login user)

    ResolutionType

    "HD"

    EDL resolution

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none EDL resolution

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous HD
    anonymous UHD

    FrameRate

    "STD_50_I"

    EDL frame rate

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none EDL frame rate

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous STD_50_I
    anonymous STD_50_P
    anonymous STD_25_P
    anonymous STD_2997_P
    anonymous STD_5994_P
    anonymous STD_5994_I

    Scale

    "STD_0916"

    EDL scale

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none EDL scale

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous STD_0916
    anonymous STD_1609
    anonymous STD_0101

    TrackInfo

    {
  "audioTrackNumber": 0,
  "videoTrackNumber": 0,
  "graphicTrackNumber": 0
}

    Tracks setting, default is 2 graphic tracks, 1 video track, and 4 audio tracks

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    audioTrackNumber integer(int32) false none The number of audio tracks
    videoTrackNumber integer(int32) false none The number of video tracks
    graphicTrackNumber integer(int32) false none The number of graphic tracks

    EDLCreationModel

    {
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "resolution": "HD",
  "frameRate": "STD_50_I",
  "scale": "STD_0916",
  "tracks": {
    "audioTrackNumber": 0,
    "videoTrackNumber": 0,
    "graphicTrackNumber": 0
  }
}

    EDL creation object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    name string true none EDL name
    folderId string true none EDL's parent folder ID
    resolution ResolutionType true none EDL resolution
    frameRate FrameRate true none EDL frame rate
    scale Scale true none EDL scale
    tracks TrackInfo false none Tracks setting, default is 2 graphic tracks, 1 video track, and 4 audio tracks

    EDLCreationResponseModel

    {
  "id": "string"
}

    Response object for EDL creation

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id string false none EDL's ID

    EDLRenderModel

    {
  "name": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "resolution": "HD"
}

    Request object is used to EDL render

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    name string true none Output material's name
    folderId string true none Specify the folder for output material
    resolution ResolutionType true none EDL resolution

    EDLRenderResponseModel

    {
  "materialId": "string"
}

    Response object for EDL rendering task

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    materialId string false none Material's ID

    RecordingTypes

    "ScheduledRecording"

    Ingestion task's type

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Ingestion task's type

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous ScheduledRecording
    anonymous PeriodicDaily
    anonymous PeriodicWeekly
    anonymous PeriodicMonthly
    anonymous ManualStart

    IngestMetadataModel

    {
  "itemName": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "jounalist": "string",
  "category": "string",
  "program": "string",
  "rights": "string"
}

    Ingest tast's metadata object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    itemName string false none Item name
    comments string false none Comments
    jounalist string false none Jounalist
    category string false none Category
    program string false none Program
    rights string false none Rights

    PeriodParameterModel

    {
  "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "periodic": true,
  "params": [
    "string"
  ]
}

    The parameters of periodic ingestion task

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    startDate string(date-time) false none Period start date
    endDate string(date-time) false none Period end date
    periodic boolean false none Whether appending recording date to periodic task name, default is "false"
    params [string] false none Specific days in period, for example:

    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicWeekly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[0,1,2,3,4,5,6]", it means "[Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday]"

    If the value of "RecordingTypes" equals to "PeriodicMonthly", the acceptable value of Params can be "[1,2...29,30,31]", it means which day in the month

    IngestCreationModel

    {
  "title": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "signalId": 0,
  "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  },
  "periodicParameter": {
    "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "periodic": true,
    "params": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}

    Ingest creation model

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    title string true none Ingest title
    folderId string true none Folder ID
    channelId integer(int64) true none Channel ID
    signalId integer(int64) true none Signal ID
    recordingType RecordingTypes true none Ingestion task's type
    startDate string true none Ingest start date
    endDate string true none Ingest end date
    ingestMetadataModel IngestMetadataModel false none Ingest tast's metadata object
    periodicParameter PeriodParameterModel false none The parameters of periodic ingestion task

    IngestionStatus

    "Ready"

    Ingestion task's status

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Ingestion task's status

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous Ready
    anonymous Manual
    anonymous Filing
    anonymous Completed
    anonymous Paused
    anonymous Failed
    anonymous Canceled

    IngestResponseModel

    {
  "id": 0,
  "title": "string",
  "recordingType": "ScheduledRecording",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "channelName": "string",
  "signalId": 0,
  "signalName": "string",
  "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "ingestionStatus": "Ready",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  },
  "periodicParameter": {
    "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "periodic": true,
    "params": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}

    Ingest response object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id integer(int64) false none Ingest ID
    title string false none Title
    recordingType RecordingTypes false none Ingestion task's type
    folderId string false none Folder ID
    channelId integer(int64) false none Channel ID
    channelName string false none Channel name
    signalId integer(int64) false none Signal ID
    signalName string false none Signal name
    startTime string(date-time) false none Ingest start time
    endTime string(date-time) false none Ingest end time
    ingestionStatus IngestionStatus false none Ingestion task's status
    ingestMetadataModel IngestMetadataModel false none Ingest tast's metadata object
    periodicParameter PeriodParameterModel false none The parameters of periodic ingestion task

    IngestModificationModel

    {
  "id": 0,
  "title": "string",
  "folderId": "string",
  "channelId": 0,
  "signalId": 0,
  "startDate": "string",
  "endDate": "string",
  "ingestMetadataModel": {
    "itemName": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "jounalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "program": "string",
    "rights": "string"
  }
}

    Ingest modification model

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id integer(int64) true none Ingestion task ID
    title string false none Title
    folderId string false none Folder ID
    channelId integer(int64) false none Channel ID
    signalId integer(int64) false none Signal ID
    startDate string false none Ingest start date
    endDate string false none Ingest end date
    ingestMetadataModel IngestMetadataModel false none Ingest tast's metadata object

    ChannelModel

    {
  "id": 0,
  "name": "string"
}

    Channel object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id integer(int64) false none Channel ID
    name string false none Channel name

    SignalModel

    {
  "id": 0,
  "name": "string"
}

    Signal object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id integer(int64) false none Signal's ID
    name string false none Signal's name

    InitiateUploadingModel

    {
  "filename": "string",
  "size": 0
}

    Request to initiate an upload job

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    filename string true none Physical file name on Hive storage
    size integer(int64) true none File size (Unit: bytes)

    InitUploadResponseModel

    {
  "jobId": "string"
}

    Response object for upload initialization

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    jobId string false none The JobID uses to identify upload job

    FileChunkUploadProgressResponseModel

    {
  "jobId": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "totalSize": 0,
  "uploadedSize": 0,
  "chunks": [
    0
  ]
}

    Response object for file's chunk upload

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    jobId string false none The JobID uses to identify upload job
    progress number(double) false none Percentage is the progress of the upload job, maximum value is 1
    totalSize integer(int64) false none The total size of the file
    uploadedSize integer(int64) false none Uploaded file size
    chunks [integer] false none Uploaded file chunks

    MaterialTypes

    "Video"

    Supported types of material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Supported types of material

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous Video
    anonymous Audio
    anonymous Picture
    anonymous Document
    anonymous Sequence
    anonymous Other

    GenealogyModel

    {}

    General metadata of material

    Properties

    None

    PermissionTypes

    "Public"

    Permission types

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Permission types

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous Public
    anonymous Private
    anonymous Condition

    PermissionReadWriteConditionModel

    {
  "read": [
    "string"
  ],
  "readWrite": [
    "string"
  ]
}

    Material permission request model

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    read [string] false none It specifies the Group's code that allows "read-only"
    readWrite [string] false none It specifies the Group's code that allows "read and write"

    MaterialPermissionModel

    {
  "type": "Public",
  "owner": "string",
  "permission": {
    "read": [
      "string"
    ],
    "readWrite": [
      "string"
    ]
  }
}

    Description of material's ACL

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    type PermissionTypes false none Permission types
    owner string false none Owner's user code
    permission PermissionReadWriteConditionModel false none Material permission request model

    AcquisitionMetadataModel

    {
  "exposureMode": "string",
  "exposureIndex": "string",
  "focusMode": "string",
  "focusPosition": "string",
  "shutterSpeed": "string",
  "masterGain": "string",
  "iso": "string",
  "whiteBalance": "string",
  "masterBlack": "string",

  "irisFNumber": "string",
  "gps": "string",
  "rawData": "string",
  "deviceManufacturer": "string",
  "deviceModel": "string",
  "deviceSerialNumber": "string"

    exposureIndex string false none Exposure index

  "name": "string",
  "place": "string",
  "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",

    FillingModel

    {
  "inputSource": "string",
  "channelName": "string",
  "deviceId": "string",
  "audioChannelQuantity": 0,
  "sof": 0,
  "eof": 0,
  "totalDuration": 0,
  "som": 0,
  "eom": 0,
  "materialDuration": 0,
  "streamChannel": 0,
  "sourceTapeBarcode": "string",
  "sourceTapeTitle": "string",
  "backupTapeTitle": "string",
  "startTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "filedFrom": "string",
  "filedBy": "string"
}

    Filling (ingest) metadata of material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    inputSource string false none Input Source
    channelName string false none Ingest Channel Name
    deviceId string false none Ingest Device ID
    audioChannelQuantity integer(int32) false none Quantity of Audio Channels
    sof integer(int64) false none SOF(STC) (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    eof integer(int64) false none EOF (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    totalDuration integer(int64) false none Total duration (unit: Frame)
    som integer(int64) false none SOM (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    eom integer(int64) false none EOM (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    materialDuration integer(int64) false none Material duration (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    streamChannel integer(int32) false none Stream channel
    sourceTapeBarcode string false none Source tape barcode
    sourceTapeTitle string false none Source tape title
    backupTapeTitle string false none Backup tape title
    startTime string(date-time) false none Filling start datetime
    endTime string(date-time) false none Filling end datetime
    filedFrom string false none Filed from
    filedBy string false none Filed by

    FieldSequenceTypes

    Export content types

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous OriginalWay
    anonymous OddFieldFirst
    anonymous EvenFieldFirst

    OriginalMetadataModel

    {
  "fieldSequence": "OriginalWay",
  "userMediaId": "string",
  "mainTitle": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "clipTitle": "string",
  "createdBy": "string",
  "recordingDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "duration": 0,
  "stc": 0,
  "videoFormat": "string",
  "audioFormat": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "umid": "string",
  "basicUMID": "string"
}

    Original metadata of material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    fieldSequence FieldSequenceTypes false none Export content types
    userMediaId string false none User media ID
    mainTitle string false none Main title
    comments string false none Comments
    clipTitle string false none Clip title
    createdBy string false none Create by
    recordingDate string(date-time) false none Recording date
    duration integer(int32) false none Clip's duration (unit: frame)
    stc integer(int32) false none STC (unit: frame)
    videoFormat string false none Video format
    audioFormat string false none Audio format
    description string false none Description
    umid string false none UMID
    basicUMID string false none Basic UMID

    AudioTrackInfoModel

    {
  "language": "string",
  "track": 0,
  "type": "string"
}

    Audio track information

    Properties

    track integer(int32) false none Track number
    type string false none Track type

    ExtraFillingModel

    {
  "videoSampling": "string",
  "aspectRatio": "string",
  "dataRate": "string",
  "wrapper": "string",
  "videoCompression": "string",
  "gop": "string",
  "frameRate": "string",
  "formatId": "string",
  "audioCompression": "string",
  "audioQuantization": "string",
  "videoColorSpace": "string"
}

    Extra filling (ingest) metadata of material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    videoSampling string false none Video sampling
    aspectRatio string false none Aspect ratio
    dataRate string false none Data rate
    wrapper string false none Wrapper
    videoCompression string false none Video compression
    gop string false none GOP
    frameRate string false none Frame rate
    formatId string false none Audio sampling rate
    audioCompression string false none Audio compression
    audioQuantization string false none Audio quantization
    videoColorSpace string false none Video color space

    GeneralMetadataModel

    {
  "acquisition": {
    "exposureMode": "string",
    "exposureIndex": "string",
    "focusMode": "string",
    "focusPosition": "string",
    "shutterSpeed": "string",

    General metadata of material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    acquisition AcquisitionMetadataModel false none Acquisition metadata
    planning PlanningModel false none Planning metadata of material
    filling FillingModel false none Filling (ingest) metadata of material
    original OriginalMetadataModel false none Original metadata of material
    audioTrackInfo [AudioTrackInfoModel] false none AudioTrackInfo
    extraFilling ExtraFillingModel false none Extra filling (ingest) metadata of material

    FileFormatAudioModel

    {
  "streams": 0,
  "bitsPerSample": 0,
  "channels": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "sampleRate": 0,
  "mediaStandardId": 0
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    streams integer(int32) false none Count of streams
    bitsPerSample integer(int32) false none Bits per sample
    channels integer(int32) false none Count of channels
    in integer(int64) false none In point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    out integer(int64) false none Out point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    sampleRate integer(int32) false none Sample rate
    mediaStandardId integer(int32) false none Media standard ID, query more information refer to the point: /api/v2/metadata/media-standard('{mediaStandardId}')

    FileFormatVideoModel

    {
  "bitRate": 0,
  "bitsPerPixel": 0,
  "frameRate": 0,
  "height": 0,
  "width": 0,
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "mediaStandardId": 0
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    bitRate integer(int64) false none Bit rate
    bitsPerPixel integer(int32) false none Bits per pixel
    frameRate number(double) false none Frame rate
    height integer(int32) false none Video height
    width integer(int32) false none Video width
    in integer(int64) false none In point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    out integer(int64) false none Out point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    mediaStandardId integer(int32) false none Media standard ID, query more information refer to the point: /api/v2/metadata/media-standard('{mediaStandardId}')

  "width": 0,
  "position": 0

    width integer(int32) false none Image width

    FileItemModel

    {
  "fileId": "string",
  "size": 0,
  "duration": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "path": "string",
  "format": {
    "audio": {
      "streams": 0,
      "bitsPerSample": 0,
      "channels": 0,
      "in": 0,
      "out": 0,
      "sampleRate": 0,
      "mediaStandardId": 0
    },
    "video": {
      "bitRate": 0,
      "bitsPerPixel": 0,
      "frameRate": 0,
      "height": 0,
      "width": 0,
      "in": 0,
      "out": 0,
      "mediaStandardId": 0
    },
    "keyframe": {
      "height": 0,
      "width": 0,
      "position": 0
    },
    "picture": {
      "height": 0,
      "width": 0
    }
  }
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    fileId string false none Physical file unique identifier
    size integer(int64) false none File size
    duration integer(int64) false none The length of audio file(unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    createTime string(date-time) false none Creation time
    path string false none File's address
    format FileFormatModel false none none

    TrackModel

    {
  "channelId": 0,
  "trackId": "string",
  "fileId": "string",
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "refIn": 0,
  "refOut": 0
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    channelId integer(int32) false none Channel order
    trackId string false none Track ID
    fileId string false none Physical file's ID
    in integer(int64) false none In point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    out integer(int64) false none Out point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    refIn integer(int64) false none Reference in point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    refOut integer(int64) false none Reference out point (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)

      "channelId": 0,
      "trackId": "string",
      "fileId": "string",
      "in": 0,
      "out": 0,
      "refIn": 0,
      "refOut": 0
    }
  ]

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    tracks [TrackModel] false none Track information for reference

        "channelId": 0,

    Response object for material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id string false none Material's Id
    name string false none Material's name
    folderId string false none Material's parent folder ID
    path string false none Folder path
    size integer(int64) false none The size of Hi-res file
    itemName string false none The item name of material
    journalist string false none Journalist
    category string false none Category
    programName string false none Program's name
    isArchived boolean false none The flag is "true" if the material has been archived, readonly
    isArchivedTo3rd boolean false none The flag is "true" if the material has been archived to 3rd party, readonly
    deleteProtection boolean false none The flag is "true" if the material under deletion protecting
    isCapturing boolean false none The indicator of capturing status
    materialId string false none The auto-incremented unique identifier
    rights string false none Description of the rights of the material which doesn't represent the permissions of the material
    comments string false none Comments of material
    type MaterialTypes false none Supported types of material
    duration integer(int64) false none Only available for Video, Audio and Sequence (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    frameRate number(double) false none Only available for Video, Audio and Sequence
    subtype string false none Subtype of material
    pendingToDelete boolean false none The flag is "true" if this material pending to deleted
    imageType string false none Image types: 4:3, 16:9 HD, 16:9 SD, Original
    createTime string(date-time) false none Creation time
    createUser string false none Creator
    modifyTime string(date-time) false none Last modification time
    modifyUser string false none Last modifier
    modifyHost string false none The terminal's IP address where midified
    genealogy GenealogyModel false none General metadata of material
    acl MaterialPermissionModel false none Description of material's ACL
    virtualTrimIn integer(int64) false none The starting time of one clip in the spanned set (unit: 100 Nanoseconds)
    metadata GeneralMetadataModel false none General metadata of material
    customMetadata object false none Custom metadata
    additionalProperties object false none none
    fileGroups [FileGroupModel] false none Physical files related to the material

    AttachmentModel

    {
  "path": "string",
  "materialType": "Video",
  "materialId": "string",
  "priority": 0,
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Import file to Hive

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    path string true none Physical file path
    materialType MaterialTypes true none Supported types of material
    materialId string true none Material's ID
    priority integer(int32) false none Specify a priority for the task of import, minimum is 1 and maximum is 99, default is 70
    tags object false none Tags for importing task
    additionalProperties string false none none

    "property2": "string"

    files integer(int32) false none Total number of files
    size integer(int64) false none Total size
    used integer(int64) false none Used space size
    roots object false none Portal of resources
    additionalProperties string false none none

    {
  "asNewName": "string",
  "comments": "string",
  "in": 0,
  "out": 0,
  "priority": 0,
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Export material request object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    asNewName string false none Leave this field's value as empty, otherwise specify a new file name
    comments string false none The comment of export task
    in integer(int32) false none The in point of the material to be exported (unit: frame)
    out integer(int32) false none The out point of the material to be exported (unit: frame)
    priority integer(int32) false none Specify a priority for the task of export, minimum is 1 and maximum is 99, default is 70
    tags object false none Tags for exporting task
    additionalProperties string false none none

    ExportTaskResponseModel

    {
  "taskId": "string",
  "siteId": 0,
  "materialId": "string"
}

    The response model of exporting task

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    taskId string false none Export task ID
    siteId integer(int32) false none Export site ID
    materialId string false none Material's ID

    DeletionRejectReasonResponseModel

    {
  "deleteProtected": true,
  "permissionDenied": true,
  "locked": true,
  "resourceType": "string",
  "resourcePath": "string",
  "resourceName": "string",
  "resourceId": "string"
}

    Response object for delete rejection reason

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    deleteProtected boolean false none The resource under delete protection
    permissionDenied boolean false none The resource under permission control
    locked boolean false none The resource has been locked by other resource, e.g. referenced by sequence
    resourceType string false none The type of resource, folder or material
    resourcePath string false none The tree path of resource
    resourceName string false none The name of resource
    resourceId string false none Material's ID or folder's ID

    ResouceDeletionResponseModel

    {
  "isSuccessful": true,
  "rejections": [
    {
      "deleteProtected": true,
      "permissionDenied": true,
      "locked": true,
      "resourceType": "string",
      "resourcePath": "string",
      "resourceName": "string",
      "resourceId": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    Response object for material deletion

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    isSuccessful boolean false none Resource has deleted or not
    rejections [DeletionRejectReasonResponseModel] false none Reasons cause the deletion to be rejected

    SortableFields

    "Type"

    Sortable fields of material can be sorted

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Sortable fields of material can be sorted

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous Type
    anonymous CreateTime
    anonymous Name

    SortBy

    "DESC"

    Decides whether the result is in ascending or descending order

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Decides whether the result is in ascending or descending order

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous DESC
    anonymous ASC

    SimpleMaterialResponseModel

    {
  "id": "string",
  "materialId": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "path": "string",
  "size": 0,
  "isArchived": true,
  "type": "Video",
  "subtype": "string",
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "createUser": "string",
  "modifyTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "modifyUser": "string",
  "thumbnail": "string",
  "acl": {
    "type": "Public",
    "owner": "string",
    "permission": {
      "read": [
        "string"
      ],
      "readWrite": [
        "string"
      ]
    }
  }
}

    Simple response object for material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id string false none Material's Id
    materialId string false none The auto-incremented unique identifier
    name string false none Material's name
    path string false none Material in the folder tree
    size integer(int64) false none The size of Hi-res file
    isArchived boolean false none It's used to mark whether the material has been archived, readonly
    type MaterialTypes false none Supported types of material
    subtype string false none Subtype of material
    createTime string(date-time) false none Creation time
    createUser string false none Creator
    modifyTime string(date-time) false none Last modification time
    modifyUser string false none Last modifier
    thumbnail string false none Thumbnail
    acl MaterialPermissionModel false none Description of material's ACL

    SimpleMaterialResponseModelPaginationResponseModel

    {
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "string",
      "materialId": "string",
      "name": "string",
      "path": "string",
      "size": 0,
      "isArchived": true,
      "type": "Video",
      "subtype": "string",
      "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "createUser": "string",
      "modifyTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "modifyUser": "string",
      "thumbnail": "string",
      "acl": {
        "type": "Public",
        "owner": "string",
        "permission": {
          "read": [
            "string"
          ],
          "readWrite": [
            "string"
          ]
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "page": 0,
  "size": 0,
  "totalCount": 0,
  "totalPage": 0,
  "elapsed": 0
}

    Pagination object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    result [SimpleMaterialResponseModel] false none Query result
    page integer(int32) false none Page's index
    size integer(int32) false none Page's size
    totalCount integer(int32) false none Count of total records
    totalPage integer(int32) false none Count of total pages
    elapsed integer(int64) false none The elapsed time of current query(unit: millisecond)

    CustomFieldResponseModel

    {
  "fieldName": "string",
  "alias": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "dataType": "string",
  "isRequired": true,
  "minLength": 0,
  "maxLength": 0,
  "enums": [
    "string"
  ],
  "isSupportMultipleValues": true
}

    Simple response object for custom field on material

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    fieldName string false none Field's unique name
    alias string false none Alias
    description string false none Field's description
    dataType string false none Field's data type
    isRequired boolean false none Identifies whether this field is required
    minLength integer(int32) false none Restriction on minimum length of value
    maxLength integer(int32) false none Restriction on maximum length of value
    enums [string] false none Enum values, available only for "enum" data type
    isSupportMultipleValues boolean false none Indicates the enum field whether support array value (multiple values) or single value, available only for "enum" data type

    {
  "acquisition": {
    "exposureMode": "string",

  "name": "string",

    Material creation object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    name string true none Material's name
    folderId string true none Folder's ID
    itemName string false none The item name of material
    journalist string false none Journalist
    category string false none Category
    programName string false none Program's name
    deleteProtection boolean false none The flag is "true" if the material under deletion protecting (default: false)
    pendingToDelete boolean false none The flag is "true" if this material pending to deleted (default: false)
    materialId string false none The auto-incremented unique identifier (if leave this as blank, generate the material ID based on the configured format in MBH)
    rights string false none Description of the rights of the material which doesn't represent the permissions of the material
    comments string false none Comments of material
    createUser string false none The user code of creator, if leave this field as blank then use current API user's code
    createHost string false none The IP address of host where user to create the material
    type MaterialTypes true none Supported types of material
    metadata GeneralMetadataCreationModel false none Creation model for general metadata part of material
    customMetadata object false none Custom metadata
    additionalProperties object false none none

    Material modification object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id string true none Material's ID
    name string false none Material's name
    folderId string false none Folder's ID
    itemName string false none The item name of material
    journalist string false none Journalist
    category string false none Category
    programName string false none Program's name
    deleteProtection boolean false none The flag is "true" if the material under deletion protecting (default: false)
    pendingToDelete boolean false none The flag is "true" if this material pending to deleted (default: false)
    materialId string false none The auto-incremented unique identifier (if leave this as blank, generate the material ID based on the configured format in MBH)
    rights string false none Description of the rights of the material which doesn't represent the permissions of the material
    comments string false none Comments of material
    modifyUser string false none Last modifier, if leave this field as blank then use current API user's code
    modifyHost string false none The IP address of host where user to modify the material
    metadata GeneralMetadataCreationModel false none Creation model for general metadata part of material
    customMetadata object false none Custom metadata
    additionalProperties object false none none

    out integer(int64) false none Only available for: Scene Marker, Logging Marker and Change Marker (unit: frame)

    type MarkerTypes false none Supported types of Marker
    color string false none Marker color
    note string false none Note
    thumbnail string false none Image URL of marker's thumbnail

    TaskResponseModel

    {
  "id": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "type": 0,
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "creatorId": "string",
  "creator": "string",
  "progress": 0,
  "status": "Success",
  "step": "string",
  "stepCursor": "string",
  "tags": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Response object for task

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id string false none Task ID
    name string false none Task name
    type integer(int32) false none Type of task, the code reference table as below:
    • 1: "Content Management: Upload"
    • 2: "Content Management: Register to OA Folder"
    • 3: "Content Management: Register to Event"
    • 4: "Premiere: Render and Export"
    • 5: "Premiere: Register to Event"
    • 6: "Content Management: Export"
    • 7: "Web Quick Editor: Save As Clip"
    • 8: "Auto Packaging"
    • 9: "Download"
    • 10: "After Effects: Render and Export"
    • 11: "Content Management: Publish to SNS"
    • 12: "Premiere: Register to OA Folder"
    • 13: "Premiere: Upload"
    • 14: "Premiere: Remote Render"
    • 15: "Generate Proxy"
    • 16: "After Effects: Render"
    • 17: "Content Management: Import"
    • 18: "Security Upload"
    • 20: "Hive Editor: Render"
    • 21: "Material List: Register to Event"
    • 24: "Material List: Register to OA Folder"
    • 25: "Material List: Export"
    • 26: "Web Quick Editor: Register To Event"
    • 27: "Material List: Import"
    • 28: "Hive Editor: Register To Event"
    • 29: "Hive Editor: Register To OAFolder"
    createTime string(date-time) false none Task creation time
    endTime string(date-time) false none Task end time
    creatorId string false none Task creator's ID
    creator string false none Task creator name
    progress number(double) false none Percent of task progress, the minimum value is 0.00, The maximum value is 100.00
    status TaskExecutionStatus false none Task execution status
    step string false none Current step name
    stepCursor string false none The cursor indicates that how is position of task progress, format: current_step_index/total_steps
    tags object false none Task's tags
    additionalProperties string false none none

    TaskResultResponseModel

    {
  "tasks": [
    {
      "id": "string",
      "name": "string",
      "type": 0,
      "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "endTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "creatorId": "string",
      "creator": "string",
      "progress": 0,
      "status": "Success",
      "step": "string",
      "stepCursor": "string",
      "tags": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "page": 0,
  "size": 0,
  "total": 0
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    tasks [TaskResponseModel] false none Returns the result of the documents that have been hit
    page integer(int32) false none Page's index
    size integer(int32) false none Page's size
    total integer(int32) false none Total records

    StorageConfigurationResponseModel

    {
  "storageCode": "string",
  "size": 0,
  "assigned": 0,
  "used": 0,
  "files": 0
}

    Response object for storage configuration

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    storageCode string false none Auto-generated code for storage configuration
    size integer(int64) false none Total size, if the values is "-1" which means the logic storage size without limitation (unit: bytes)
    assigned integer(int64) false none Assigned storage size (unit: bytes)
    used integer(int64) false none Used storage size (unit: bytes)
    files integer(int64) false none Total number of files

    ServiceStatusResponseModel

    {
  "name": "string",
  "nodes": [
    {
      "hostname": "string",
      "status": "Up",
      "uptime": 0,
      "downtime": 0
    }
  ],
  "status": "Up",
  "uptime": 0,
  "downtime": 0
}

    The response model of service status

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    name string false none Service name
    nodes [ServiceStatusOnNodeResponseModel] false none The node(s) where the service is deployed
    status ServiceStatus false none The running status of foundation service
    uptime integer(int32) false none Uptime (unit: second)
    downtime integer(int32) false none Downtime (unit: second)

  "planningDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "startDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "endDate": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "director": "string",
  "photographer": "string",
  "reporter": "string",
  "otherEngineer": "string",
  "equipment": "string",
  "contactInfo": "string",
  "inputSource": "string",
  "sourceType": "SDI",
  "metadata": {
    "rights": "string",
    "comments": "string",
    "itemName": "string",
    "journalist": "string",
    "category": "string",
    "programName": "string",
    "tapeBarcode": "string",
    "tapeTitle": "string"
  }
}

    Planning creation object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    name string true none Planning's name
    folderId string true none Folder ID
    inputBy string false none Input by
    place string false none Place
    planningDate string(date-time) false none Planning date
    startDate string(date-time) false none The start date of planning
    endDate string(date-time) false none The end date of planning
    director string false none Director
    photographer string false none Photographer
    reporter string false none Reporter
    otherEngineer string false none Other engineer
    equipment string false none Equipment
    contactInfo string false none Contact information
    inputSource string false none Input source
    sourceType PlanningSourceType false none Options for planning's resource types
    metadata PlanningMaterialMetadataModel false none Planning's material metadata

    SearchableFieldResponseModel

    {
  "hiveFieldName": "string",
  "fieldName": "string",
  "type": "string",
  "availableValues": {
    "property1": "string",
    "property2": "string"
  }
}

    Response model for searchable field

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    hiveFieldName string false none none
    fieldName string false none Field name for search
    type string false none Field type
    availableValues object false none Only available when field type is "enum"
    additionalProperties string false none none

    SearchableFieldCollectionResponseModel

    {
  "material": [
    {
      "hiveFieldName": "string",
      "fieldName": "string",
      "type": "string",
      "availableValues": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "folder": [
    {
      "hiveFieldName": "string",
      "fieldName": "string",
      "type": "string",
      "availableValues": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "sequence": [
    {
      "hiveFieldName": "string",
      "fieldName": "string",
      "type": "string",
      "availableValues": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "marker": [
    {
      "hiveFieldName": "string",
      "fieldName": "string",
      "type": "string",
      "availableValues": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Response model for searchable field collection

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    material [SearchableFieldResponseModel] false none Searchable fields for material
    folder [SearchableFieldResponseModel] false none Searchable fields for folder
    sequence [SearchableFieldResponseModel] false none Searchable fields for sequence
    marker [SearchableFieldResponseModel] false none Searchable fields for marker

    BooleanOperators

    "AND"

    Boolean operators for fulltext search

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Boolean operators for fulltext search

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous AND
    anonymous OR
    anonymous NOT

    FieldConditionModel

    {
  "field": "string",
  "value": "string",
  "operator": "AND"
}

    Field condition object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    field string true none Field name
    value string false none All types of values should be string format in request payload, even "integer" should be "0", "10"
    Supports range searches:
    Number range: [* TO 10000]
    Date range: [2000-01-01 00:00:00 TO 2000-12-31 23:59:59]
    Supports wildcard matching:
    Starts with "foo" in field: foo*
    Starts with "foo" and ends with "bar" in the field: foo*bar
    operator BooleanOperators false none Boolean operators for fulltext search

    "Material"

    Index repository names available for search

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    anonymous string false none Index repository names available for search

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    anonymous Material
    anonymous Marker
    anonymous Folder
    anonymous Sequence

    FulltextSearchRequestModel

    {
  "conditions": [
    {
      "field": "string",
      "value": "string",
      "operator": "AND"
    }
  ],
  "repository": "Material"
}

    Fulltext search request object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    conditions [FieldConditionModel] true none Field condition object
    repository RepositoryNames true none Index repository names available for search

  "subscriberId": "string",
  "events": [
    "string"
  ],
  "callback": "string"
}

    Response object for event subscription

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    subscriberId string false none Store the Subscriber's ID which is used to unsubscribe the event
    events [string] false none Events have been subscribed
    callback string false none Callback address

    {
  "source": "string",
  "time": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "userId": "string"
}

    The notification operator object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    source string false none The identification code for application/service/terminal in Hive
    time string(date-time) false none The time when the event was triggered
    userId string false none The user's ID

    NotificationWrapperModel

    {
  "offset": 0,
  "message": {},
  "event": "string",
  "operator": {
    "source": "string",
    "time": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    "userId": "string"
  }
}

    Notification wrapper

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    offset integer(int64) false none Message content
    message object false none Message content
    event string false none Available events to be subscribe
    operator NotificationOperatorModel false none The notification operator object

    {
  "groupCode": "string",
  "groupName": "string"
}

    Indicate weather inherited from other groups

    groupCode string false none From group's code
    groupName string false none From group's name

  "code": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "fromGroup": {
    "groupCode": "string",
    "groupName": "string"
  }

    name string false none Role's name for display
    fromGroup FromGroup false none Indicate weather inherited from other groups

    StoragePoolResponseModel

    {
  "poolCode": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "dependsOnGroup": {},
  "dependsOnRole": {},
  "units": [
    {
      "unitCode": "string",
      "label": [
        "string"
      ],
      "files": 0,
      "size": 0,
      "used": 0,
      "roots": {
        "property1": "string",
        "property2": "string"
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    poolCode string false none Storage pool's code
    description string false none Description
    dependsOnGroup object false none Storage space from group
    dependsOnRole object false none Storage space from role
    units [StorageUnitResponseModel] false none Storage units

    {
  "id": "string",
  "avatarUrl": "string",
  "email": "string",
  "loginName": "string",
  "showName": "string",
  "phoneNumber": "string",
  "groups": [
    {
      "code": "string",
      "name": "string"
    }
  ],
  "roles": [
    {
      "code": "string",
      "name": "string",

        "groupCode": "string",
        "groupName": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "permissions": [
    "string"
  ],
  "storages": [
    {
      "poolCode": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "dependsOnGroup": {},
      "dependsOnRole": {},
      "units": [
        {
          "unitCode": "string",
          "label": [
            "string"
          ],
          "files": 0,
          "size": 0,
          "used": 0,
          "roots": {
            "property1": "string",
            "property2": "string"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "createTime": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "status": "Active"
}

    Response object for user

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    id string false none User's ID
    avatarUrl string false none An URL of the user's avatar
    email string false none Email
    loginName string false none User's login ID, it's unique and case-insensitive
    showName string false none User's name for display
    phoneNumber string false none User's contact number
    groups [SimpleGroupResponseModel] false none User's groups
    roles [SimpleRoleResponseModel] false none User's roles
    permissions [string] false none Permission codes
    storages [StoragePoolResponseModel] false none The available storage space of the user
    createTime string(date-time) false none User creation time
    status UserStatus false none User's status

    {
  "loginName": "string",
  "showName": "string",
  "password": "string",

  "phoneNumber": "string",
  "groupCodes": [
    "string"
  ],
  "roleCodes": [
    "string"
  ],
  "avatarUrl": "string"
}

    User creation object

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    loginName string true none Login name for authentication, it does not allow other special symbols except the "_"
    showName string true none User's display name
    password string true none Passowrd
    email string false none User's email
    phoneNumber string false none User's phone number
    groupCodes [string] false none Assign one or more groups to the user
    roleCodes [string] false none Assign one or more roles to the user
    avatarUrl string false none User's avatar, image url

    RoleResponseModel

    {
  "code": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "permissions": [
    {
      "key": "string",
      "description": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    Response object for Hive role

    Properties

    Name Type Required Restrictions Description
    code string false none Role's code
    name string false none Role's name for display
    description string false none Role's description
    permissions [PermissionResponseModel] false none The assigned permissions of the role
    Shell HTTP JavaScript Ruby Python PHP Java Go
